Acquisition Date.name: Acquisition Date

Shows the date when you acquired:
- Achievements
- Quests
- Duties
- Levels
- Fish
- Sightseeing Log Entries
- Glasses
- Minions
- Mounts
- Orchestrion Rolls
- Fashion Accessories
And More!
punchline: Shows the date when you acquired something.

ActionEffectRange.name: ActionEffectRange
ActionEffectRange.description:
This plugin provides a visual cue on the effect range of the AoE action you just used.

May be used as a supplement/replacement to the actions' VFXs in showing effect range related information, such as where has the action landed and how large an area it covered.
punchline: Provides a visual cue on the effect range of the AoE action just used.

Adaptive Hud.description:
Useful for ultrawide users, swapping from windowed/fullscreen will automatically switch your hudlayout.

/pah to configure

Aether Compass.name: Aether Compass
Aether Compass.description:
This plugin detects certain objects/NPCs such as Aether Currents nearby and shows where they are by various ways, e.g. pointing to their locations on screen and notifying you in Chat.

Currently detects:
	- Aether Currents
	- Eureka Elementals (by apetih)
	- Mob Hunt Elite Marks
	- Gathering Points
	- [Experimental] Island Sanctuary Gathering Objects and Animals
	- [Experimental] Quest-related NPCs/Objects 

Note: Because most objects/NPCs are not loaded when they are too faraway or when there are too many entities nearby (such as too many player characters), they will not be detected in this case.

Icon by Lumas Arkfrost
punchline: Compasses that detect and mark certain nearby objects/NPCs

Aether Remote.description: This plugin allows you and your friends to control each other, and optionally allows even more control utilizing glamourer & mare

AetherSense Redux (18+).description: An advanced haptic feedback plugin for game controllers, adult toys, and more using the Buttplug.io library. Requires Intiface Desktop to operate.

Aetherment.name: Aetherment
Aetherment.description: Auto updates mods and allows for more customization such as color and compositing onto other files
punchline: Auto-updating and more customizable mods

Aethersense Redux Reborn.description: An advanced haptic feedback plugin for game controllers, adult toys, and more using the Buttplug.io library. Requires Intiface Desktop to operate.

Allagan Item Search.name: Allagan Item Search
Allagan Item Search.description: Allagan Item Search is a dalamud plugin designed to help you search and filter all the items available in the game.
punchline: Trying to find that item you don't know the name of? Maybe Allagan Item Search can help.

Allagan Market.name: Allagan Market
Allagan Market.description:
Allagan Market's primary purpose is to provide a list of all retainer listings/sales across all characters.

It'll do it's best to track your sales but it works best when it's always on!
punchline: Get your retainer sales organized, track active sales, historical sales and undercutting!

Allagan Tools.name: Allagan Tools
Allagan Tools.description:
Allagan Tool's primary purpose is to keep track of items across your characters/retainers/free company. With it's filter system you'll never lose track of items or not know where they should be sorted.

While this is it's primary purpose, it has quite an exhaustive list of other features including:
	- Craft planning
	- Market board integration
	- Item highlighting in inventories when searching/sorting and picking ingredients for crafts
	- Item window that includes vendor and source information among other things
	- Duty/mob/airship/submarine windows that are fully searchable
	- A filtering system that lets you setup complex searches for specific items 
	- Tooltip integration that'll let you see where the items are on hover
punchline: Get organized in FFXIV, easily locate/show where to sort items, plan your crafting, and search for mobs, duties, airships, and submarines!

Altoholic.name: Altoholic
Altoholic.description: Get gils, currencies, inventory and retainers items from all your characters
punchline: Informations about your alts

AntiAfkKick.name: AntiAfkKick
punchline: A Dalamud plugin for preventing being auto-kicked from FFXIV due to inactivity. Install and forget, no config needed.

AntiAfkKickInHighEndDuty.name: AntiAfkKickInHighEndDuty
AntiAfkKickInHighEndDuty.description: A Dalamud plugin for preventing being auto-kicked from FFXIV due to inactivity. Based on the AntiAFKKick from NightmareXIV but limited to only work in duties found under the high end duty tab.
punchline: A Dalamud plugin for preventing being auto-kicked from FFXIV due to inactivity. Only work in duties found under the high end duty tab.

Arc Sys Countdown Messages.name: Arc Sys Countdown Messages

Artisan.name: Artisan
Artisan.description: The all-in-one crafting plugin. Perfect for people with next to no knowledge about crafting rotations. No need for a library of different macros, the solvers will work dynamically to try and complete your crafts. Also provides convenient ways to craft lists of items or grind out a specific item repeatedly.

Athavar's ToolBox.name: Athavar's ToolBox
Athavar's ToolBox.description: Various tools for private use. Module: AutoSpear, CraftQueue, Dps, DutyHistory, Instancinator, Macro, OpcodeWizard, SliceIsRight, Yes

Audible Character Status.name: Audible Character Status
Audible Character Status.description:

You will need to provide your own sound files.

Auto Jail Marker.description: A scuffed uwu jail auto marker

Auto Login.name: Auto Login
Auto Login.description: Automatically logs you into a specified character when the game first opens.

Auto Pillion.name: Auto Pillion
Auto Pillion.description:
When a party member gets on a mount that supports more than 1 person and is close enough, you will automatically get on.

This plugin is in testing and will have one or more issues, laid out below:

- You may need to right click on the driver once each time you start the game before the plugin will automount their mount. A fix is being investigated.

Please report issues/bugs and post suggestions on the Github website by clicking the globe icon.
punchline: Automatically ride on other people's mounts!

Auto Summon.name: Auto Summon
Auto Summon.description: Because Boup forgets to summon his pet

Auto-umbrella+.name: Auto-umbrella+
Auto-umbrella+.description:
Auto-umbrella+ lets you set your auto-umbrella to different parasols based on the gearset you're wearing
Not much configuration needed, just switch to any job/gearset you'd like and set up your auto-umbrella as you normally would!
punchline: An auto-umbrella for every job & gearset!

AutoDuty.name: AutoDuty
AutoDuty.description: A plugin to run dungeons for you with Trust, Duty Support, Squadrons and Regular, Requires BossMod, vnavmesh and Rotation Solver (Recommend Reborn Fork)

AutoMammet.name: AutoMammet
AutoMammet.description: Provides an easy copy and pastable CSV format you can use for island sanctuary spreadsheets. Provides options to export the popularity, future popularity and the current cycle's supply and demand shift values. Both as words and as numbers on a scale of -2 to 2. This plugin does not provide any calculations for Island Sanctuary, merely an export option for your ingame data. Information is exported to your clipboard, so you can paste into any other program.
punchline: Provides an easy copy and pastable CSV format you can use for island sanctuary spreadsheets.

AutoMinion.name: AutoMinion
AutoMinion.description: Automatically dismiss your minion when entering a house and summon it back when you leave

AutoMountBgm.name: AutoMountBgm
AutoMountBgm.description: Some mounts have really cool BGM tracks (Cruise Chaser FTW) while others are almost sickening in how much you hear them. It's annoying to keep needing to use /mountbgm, but now you won't have to - just let the plugin do it for you!
punchline: Automatically control mount BGM for individual mounts!

AutoQuest.name: AutoQuest
AutoQuest.description: [测试][未完成][开坑][不确定能不能填完坑] 自动任务

AutoTimer.description: Auto-Attack Timer Bar based on the Triggernometry trigger by aya liz.

Automaton.name: Automaton
Automaton.description: Collection of tweaks that either do not fit in the main plugin or are being tested here.

Avant-Garde.name: Avant-Garde
Avant-Garde.description:
This plugin is a crowdsourced project, aiming to provide a comprehensive list for all hint categories.
See the github page for information on how you can contribute.
punchline: Displays a list of valid gear pieces beside hints in the Fashion Report minigame.

Avarice.name: Avarice
Avarice.description: Positional feedback with pixel perfect rear/flank tracking, range indicators, and more.
punchline: Positional feedback with pixel perfect rear/flank tracking, range indicators, and more.

BISBuddy.name: BISBuddy
BISBuddy.description:
Highlights gear, coffers, and materia needed for all your gearsets. Imports directly from Etro or Xivgear for frictionless setup.

Highlights items needed for gearsets on:
    - Need/Greed Loot Windows
    - NPC Shops and Exchanges
    - Marketboard
    - Player Inventories
    - Item Tooltips

When melding materia, highlights:
    - Items to meld
    - Materia to meld to item

Automatically syncs gearsets with player inventory
punchline: Gearing, streamlined.

BardToolbox.name: BardToolbox
punchline:
An all-in-one toolbox, providing all the essentials bards & bands would need every day.
SPECIAL THANKS to MidiBard and FFXIV Bards & Bands Community. Join: discord.gg/ff14bard

Bartender.name: Bartender
Bartender.description: Save and load hotbars with macros and/or chat commands. We all need more than 10 hotbars, well now we do have those.
punchline: Need more hotbars? You damn bet we all do.

BatteryGauge.name: BatteryGauge
BatteryGauge.description:
Hey, you! Yes, you! Do you play FFXIV on your laptop or Steam Deck? Or are you so addicted to FFXIV that you have a UPS on your desktop just so you can keep playing through power outages? Then this is the plugin for you!

BatteryGauge adds a battery indicator to your server info bar showing your current battery percentage and expected remaining lifespan (as reported by Windows).
punchline: Keep track of your FFXIV device's battery.

Battlevest.name: Battlevest
punchline: Battle LeveQuest Helper

Beachcomber.name: Beachcomber
Beachcomber.description:
This solver examines your Island Sanctuary data (including your Isleventory!) to provide recommendations to maximize your Seafarer's Cowrie earnings.

Made in collaboration with the Overseas Casuals.
punchline: Determines the most profitable agenda for your Island Sanctuary workshop each cycle

Beeg Window.name: Beeg Window
Beeg Window.description: Ensures that the game window is maximized when launching in windowed mode.
punchline: That sure is a beeg window.

Better Housing.name: Better Housing
Better Housing.description: An improved housing experience. Furniture selection based on what you see, keybinds to switch modes and toggle counter and snap.
punchline: Furniture selection that actually works properly

Better Minion Roulette.name: Better Minion Roulette
Better Minion Roulette.description:
Allows any number of minions to be enabled for the minion roulette, instead of having to choose between the
"up to 30" and "EVERYTHING" modes supported by the game. Also has (or will have) an option to omit the
island sanctuary minions from being spawned.
punchline: Choose which minions show up in the minions roulette.

Better Mount Roulette.name: Better Mount Roulette
Better Mount Roulette.description: Allows any number of mounts to be enabled for the mount roulette, instead of having to choose between the "up to 30" and "EVERYTHING" modes supported by the game.
punchline: Choose which mounts show up in the mount roulette.

Better Party Finder.name: Better Party Finder
Better Party Finder.description:
Filter the party finder better.

All vanilla filtering is available, plus:

- Create filter presets to easily switch between
- Whitelist/blacklist specific duties and categories
- Add character names to hide PFs from
- Remove PFs above maximum item level
- Filter on item level range
- Filter on multiple jobs and slots (ex. MCH + GNB available)

Better Party Finder modE.name: Better Party Finder modE
Better Party Finder modE.description:
Filter the party finder better. Modified by etnAtker.

All vanilla filtering is available, plus:

- Create filter presets to easily switch between
- Whitelist/blacklist specific duties and categories
- Add character names to hide PFs from
- Remove PFs above maximum item level
- Filter on item level range
- Filter on multiple jobs and slots (ex. MCH + GNB available)

etnAtker modifies:

- Add a checkbox to force one player per job, even if the party leader didn't set it.
- Add a blacklist to hide parties by jobs you set.
punchline: Use advanced Party Finder filter presets.

Better Playtime.name: Better Playtime
Better Playtime.description:
Provides expanded functionality to seamlessly track total playtime.
      Use /btime once on each character to add them.

      - Supports multiple characters,
      - Customisable output formats such as hours or minutes
      - Automatic playtime tracking after character got registered
      - Simple window to see current session playtime
      - Server Info Bar integration
punchline: Ever wanted detailed information on your playtime all the way down to the second?

Better Shadows.name: Better Shadows
Better Shadows.description: Directly adjust the distance of each shadow cascade! Now introducing 4k shadowmap!
punchline: Take control of your shadows!

Better Targeting System.name: Better Targeting System
Better Targeting System.description: A more intelligent targeting system for the game which also includes new keybinds.
punchline: A more intelligent targeting system for the game.

Better borderless window mode.name: Better borderless window mode
Better borderless window mode.description: Borderless window can now be properly minimized (by clicking on taskbar or by win+down shortcut); when moved between monitors (win+shift+left/right), resolution is updated automatically.
punchline: Make borderless window mode work well with aero shortcuts

Better in Blue.name: Better in Blue
Better in Blue.description: Allows you to save, load, and share infinite Blue Mage spell loadouts.
punchline: Infinite Blue Mage spell loadouts.

Big Nael Quotes.name: Big Nael Quotes
Big Nael Quotes.description: Displays Nael quotes using the Dawntrail gimmick-text so they're easier to read.
punchline: Makes Nael quotes more visible.

BigPlayerDebuffs.name: BigPlayerDebuffs
BigPlayerDebuffs.description: Scales up buffs/debuffs applied by you on Target Status frames
punchline: Larger personal debuffs

BilingualTooltips.name: BilingualTooltips
BilingualTooltips.description:
Yes, we have tooltips displayed in two languages now. You paid SE for 4 languages so make very good use of it.

- Interested in localised item descriptions in different languages?
- Got fed up of transliterated カタカナ and would rather read just the original words?

We've got you! See plugin config to customise your own experience.
punchline: In case the WoL speaks more than one language

Blind Box.name: Blind Box
Blind Box.description:
用来统计盲盒中物品获得情况的插件。
/blindbox 打开盲盒信息界面。
/blindbox config 打开设置界面。
punchline: 查看盲盒中物品的获得情况。

Blue Mage Helper.name: Blue Mage Helper
Blue Mage Helper.description: Adds monster names and coordinates to the "Where to Learn" section of your blue mage spellbook.
punchline: Helps you fill our your Blue Mage Spellbook

Boss Mod.name: Boss Mod
Boss Mod.description: 20250305-请支持逆光喵，谢谢喵-画得更全喵
punchline: Don't fail at raid mechanics anymore

BossMod Reborn.name: BossMod Reborn
BossMod Reborn.description: A bunch of utilities to simplify boss mechanics
punchline: Don't fail at raid mechanics anymore

Bossmod Reborn.name: Bossmod Reborn
Bossmod Reborn.description: 仅禁用了与后期软件冲突的代码（AI可用，自动循环可能失效）
versions: The Combat Reborn Team / NiGuangOwO（本地化&适配）
punchline: 大脑按摩用的(在线安装Only)

Bozja Buddy.name: Bozja Buddy
Bozja Buddy.description:
Features:
• Resistance relic guide and tracking.
• Info about Lost Actions, Fragments, FATEs/CE, Field Notes e.g. location, drops, marketboard price, fate chains, mettle rewards, exp rewards, etc.
• Node graph viewer.
• Weather forecast.
• Alarms based on time, weather, and FATE/CE.
• Custom loadouts planning, saving, and sharing. Featuring recommended loadouts from many communities.
• Overlay for Lost Find Cache. Filterable by name, role, fragment, weight, and Custom Loadout of choice.
• View Bozja stats and Cache from anywhere. Customisable alert for actions that are running low.
• Delubrum Reginae (Savage) resources and communities.
punchline: Improve your Bozja sufferring. Maybe.

Brio.name: Brio
Brio.description: Control & edit actors during GPose sessions.
punchline: Enhanced GPosing.

Browser Host.name: Browser Host
Browser Host.description:
Dalamud plugin for in-game browser rendering. Think OverlayPlugin, but it's in the game itself.
Use the settings button below or the '/bh config' command to configure.

Browsingway.name: Browsingway
Browsingway.description:
Renders browser overlays in-game to enable playing in fullscreen (and G-SYNC) while having access to ACT overlays.
Use the settings button below or the '/bw config' command to configure.
Based on the BrowserHost plugin by ackwell.
punchline: Browser overlays rendered in-game.

Burning Down the House.name: Burning Down the House
Burning Down the House.description: Move around housing items with coordinates and allows you to place anywhere.

Burnt Toast.name: Burnt Toast
Burnt Toast.description: Hides toast notifications you don't want to see.

CBT (formerly known as Automaton).name: CBT (formerly known as Automaton)
punchline: Extra illegal

CWLSLastSeenTool.name: CWLSLastSeenTool
CWLSLastSeenTool.description: A tool for tracking when CWLS members were last seen online. /cwlslst to open the tool.
punchline: A tool for tracking when CWLS members were last seen online.

Cammy.name: Cammy
Cammy.description:
一个简单的相机修改器，可以更改各种游戏默认值，比如缩放和视角。
这会破解游戏缩放限制，如果你不清楚会造成什么后果，不要安装。
punchline: 一个简单的游戏相机设置修改器

Casexile.name: Casexile
Casexile.description: Lets you use any in-game slash command without worrying about capitalization. Whether you type "/action", "/ACTION", "/AcTiOn" or any variation thereof, the plugin ensures the intended action takes place without wasting your time.
punchline: Case-Insensitive Slash Commands

Chameleon.name: Chameleon
punchline: Real fakename in memory

CharaCradThief.name: CharaCradThief
CharaCradThief.description: 就偷就偷 好看的就偷！
punchline: 铭牌小偷

Character Data Sync.name: Character Data Sync
Character Data Sync.description: This plugin allows you to use your character data from your main character on all others.

Character Data Sync X.name: Character Data Sync X
Character Data Sync X.description:
在插件设置界面选择好主角色后, 自动同步你主角色游戏设置数据至所有角色上
相比原版: 重写了界面, 提供了明确的主角色设置, 不会再动你的原始数据文件, 而是把非主角色的文件读取重定向至主角色
punchline: 用你的主角色设置数据游玩所有角色~

Character Panel Refined.name: Character Panel Refined
Character Panel Refined.description: Character Panel Refined cuts away useless information from the character panel, while adding useful stats like critical hit and direct hit percentages as well as estimates damage output to allow for easier comparison of gear.
punchline: Refine the character panel to display only useful information like crit and direct hit chance

Chat 2.name: Chat 2
Chat 2.description:
Chat 2 is a complete rewrite of the in-game chat window as a plugin.
It supports:

- Unlimited tabs
- Tabs that always send to a certain channel
- More flexible filtering
- RGB channel colouring
- Completely variable font size
- Sidebar tabs
- Unread counts
- Emotes
- Screenshot mode (obfuscate names)

Chat Extender.name: Chat Extender
Chat Extender.description: This plugin adds functionality to FFXIV in-game chat.

Chat Proximity.name: Chat Proximity
Chat Proximity.description: This plugin will change message in the chat within the "say" channel, darkening people when they're far from you.
punchline: Know how far they talk from.

Chat Tools.name: Chat Tools
Chat Tools.description:
Chat Tools was developed to cut through the cluttered chat that can happen at large RP events, or in crowded environments.

Just some of the things you can do with Chat Tools is:
- Filter messages in crowded environments
- Set up windows to watch specific characters of your choice
- Set up windows to watch for messages from a group of characters
- Quickly scan what your selected or hovered targets have said
- Search through your message history
- Preserve messages on logout
punchline: Filter messages in crowded environments, bringing some sanity back to RP.

ChatAlerts.name: ChatAlerts
ChatAlerts.description: Play sounds and highlight text based on defined filters.
punchline: Play sounds and highlight text based on defined filters.

ChatContext.name: ChatContext
ChatContext.description: Add sender target name in chat messages and displays nearly player targets
punchline: Add sender target name in chat messages.

ChatCoordinates.name: ChatCoordinates
ChatCoordinates.description: Places flag marker on map from coordinates in chat. "/coord help" or "/ctp help" for more info.

ChatEmoteColor.name: ChatEmoteColor
ChatEmoteColor.description: A simple plugin that recolors emote chat lines depending on who is executing the emote and their target.
punchline: Recolors emote lines in chat.

ChatGPT for FFXIV.name: ChatGPT for FFXIV
ChatGPT for FFXIV.description: Lets you interact with ChatGPT through the in-game chat. Configuration requires an API key.
punchline: has science gone too far?

ChatTranslated.name: ChatTranslated
punchline: Ingame chat translator.

ChatTyper.name: ChatTyper
ChatTyper.description: Prefixes all chatbox messages with their chat types.

Chatter.name: Chatter
Chatter.description: Allows for saving char conversations, separated by groups of people and chat types.
punchline: Saves and filters chats.

Chibi Omega.name: Chibi Omega
punchline: Aww, he's so cute! But don't let his diminished stature fool you; his damage output has not scaled to match.

Chill Frames.name: Chill Frames
Chill Frames.description: Tired of your GPU melting your face off while just running around? Why render at 240 FPS when you're just staring at that gathering node? Fret no more! Chill Frames allows you dynamically limit your framerate when doing unimportant tasks!
punchline: Dynamic Framerate Limiter, changes fps limit depend on what you are doing

Clarity In Chaos.name: Clarity In Chaos
Clarity In Chaos.description: Automatically adjusts the Battle Effects settings according to Party size.
punchline: Seek visual serenity in the midst of Chaos

Clean Hunt Chat.name: Clean Hunt Chat
Clean Hunt Chat.description:
Hides shouts and yells, unless they contain flag coordinates or 'switching instance' messages.
Use /cleanhunt to turn on for a configurable amount of time (default 1 hour).
Use /cleanhunt off to disable early.
punchline:
No more cringe during hunt trains.
Temporarily filters away Shouts and Yells that don't contain a flag or an instance message.

Coin Pouch.name: Coin Pouch
punchline: Currency alerts and convenient teleports.

CollectableCalculator.name: CollectableCalculator
CollectableCalculator.description: Shows how many scrips and items you would receive if you turn in your current inventory.
punchline: Shows how many scrips and items you would receive if you turn in your current inventory.

Collections.name: Collections
Collections.description:
Collections provides an interface to track, discover and interact with your Collections in game.
Integrates with Glamour systems (Preview, Create Sets, Glamour Plates).
Supports: Glamour, Mounts, Minions, Emotes, Hairstyles, Triple Triad, Blue Mage, Bardings.
punchline: Track, Discover and Interact with your Collections in game

Collector's Anxiety.name: Collector's Anxiety
Collector's Anxiety.description: Collector's Anxiety helps completionists or players with a hobby for collecting in-game things keep track of what they do or don't have in an easy-to-use checklist format. Data is loaded live from the game, so collection statuses are updated in real-time.
punchline: Hey guys, Famous YouTuber here. Do you ever get Collector's Anxiety?

Combat Cursor Containment.name: Combat Cursor Containment
Combat Cursor Containment.description: Automatically changes the 'limit mouse operation to game window' setting when entering/exiting combat.
punchline: Keep your mouse cursor contained during combat!

CombatHeadgear.name: CombatHeadgear
CombatHeadgear.description: Toggle headgear visibility in and out of combat.

Congratulations.name: Congratulations
Congratulations.description:
Get aurally rewarded when you get commended on duties.

Comes with default sounds for when you get commended by 1/3, 2/3, 3/3 or all seven members of the duty you were in, but you can set custom sounds for each type of trigger by opening /congratsconfig.

The fractioned values are in relation to how many of those members could commend you (i.e. excluding those that were in your party before joining the duty).
punchline: Get aurally rewarded when you get commended on duties.

ContactsTracker.name: ContactsTracker
ContactsTracker.description:
Remember to change setting according to your need.
Use the Settings button to enter analyze window.
punchline: Help you record duty and who you met.

Coordinate Importer.name: Coordinate Importer
Coordinate Importer.description: Import map coordinates from various sources (e.g. Siren Hunts or Bear Toolkit) and dump them into echo chat. Use /ci to open the dialog box.
punchline: Import map coordinates to echo chat.

CopyTranslated.name: CopyTranslated
CopyTranslated.description: Copy translated item name by right-clicking.
punchline: Copy translated item name by right-clicking.

Craft Remaining.name: Craft Remaining
Craft Remaining.description: A simple plugin that displays how much progress and quality is remaining for your craft, without having to do the maths! Great to use in conjunction with Calculations or SimpleTweaks Improved Crafter Tooltips.
punchline: A simple plugin that displays how much progress and quality is remaining for your craft.

Craftimizer.name: Craftimizer
Craftimizer.description: Allows you to generate macros and simulate all sorts of crafts without having to open another app. Open your crafting log to get started!
punchline: Simulate crafts, create computer-assisted macros, and get mid-craft suggestions from the comfort of your own game!

Craftimizer (Unofficial).name: Craftimizer (Unofficial)
Craftimizer (Unofficial).description: Allows you to generate macros and simulate all sorts of crafts without having to open another app. Open your crafting log to get started!
punchline: Unofficial/uncertified build of Craftimizer. Simulate crafts, create computer-assisted macros, and get mid-craft suggestions from the comfort of your own game!

Crafting List.name: Crafting List
punchline: Craft stuffs

CrossUp.name: CrossUp
CrossUp.description:
This plugin provides customizations for the look and feel of the Cross Hotbar

-Split up the left/right hotbars
-Display Expanded Hold Controls Separately
-Customize colors and element positions
punchline: Customize the Cross Hotbar!

Currency Spender.name: Currency Spender
Currency Spender.description: Never wonder 'What should I do with this?' again. Access real-time prices from Universalis, identify missing collectibles tied to your currencies, and unlock new possibilities for utilizing your in-game resources effectively.
punchline: Discover how to use all the in-game currencies.

Currency Tracker.name: Currency Tracker
Currency Tracker.description:
记录你每一笔货币收支的数额、时间、地点与来源
Track every change of your currecies with its Amount, Time, Location and Source
punchline: 记录你全部的货币收支情况 / Track all your currecies

CurrencyAlert.name: CurrencyAlert
CurrencyAlert.description: This plugin lets you easily manage your various currencies to prevent from wasting precious resources.
punchline: Display alerts upon reaching configurable currencies thresholds.

CustomResolution.name: CustomResolution
CustomResolution.description: Basic plugin that allows you to specify a custom resolution.
punchline: Enforces a custom resolution for the game, similar to NVIDIA DSR.

Customize+.name: Customize+
Customize+.description: A plugin that allows you to customize your character beyond FFXIV limitations by directly editing bone parameters.
punchline: Customize your character beyond FFXIV's limitations.

DSR Toolbox.name: DSR Toolbox
DSR Toolbox.description:
Current functions:
Resolve eyes position
Wroth flames automarker (whole group and personal)
Tether to your chain partner
punchline: A helper plugin for Dragonsong's Reprise (Ultimate).

DaCoblyn.name: DaCoblyn
DaCoblyn.description: Translate tools that allow you to communicate with foreign friend that you doesn't know what they're saying.
punchline: Speak to your Japanese friend!

Dagobert.name: Dagobert
punchline: Penny pinching to the extreme

Daily Routines.name: Daily Routines
Daily Routines.description:
轻量化、低性能消耗、简单的自动化功能/易用性改动合集, 帮你从一些无意义的重复性工作中解放出来
A collection of lightweight, simple automation features/easy-to-use modules to free you from meaningless repetitive tasks.
punchline: 帮忙解决一些日常重复性劳动 / Help with some of the daily repetitive tasks

DailyDuty.name: DailyDuty
DailyDuty.description: Automatically track and complete many daily and weekly tasks.
punchline: Easily Track Daily and Weekly tasks

DalamudRepoBrowser.name: DalamudRepoBrowser
DalamudRepoBrowser.description: An interface for browsing and managing third party repositories.
punchline: Browse and add third party repositories in an instant

Damage Info.name: Damage Info
Damage Info.description: Configurable UI options for extra damage information. /dmginfo displays the config.

Death Recap.name: Death Recap
Death Recap.description:
Quickly figure out what killed you or your party members!

Shows:
- Healing
- Damage taken
- Debuffs
- Buffs
- Barriers
- Addle, Feint, Reprisal on damage source
punchline: Quickly figure out what killed you or your party members!

Death Roll Helper.name: Death Roll Helper
Death Roll Helper.description:
## Modes
### Venue:
- Concise display of all concurrent players in a list-based format
- Supports multiple sorting types (min, max, nearest to)
- Highlight numbers based on regex matching

### DeathRoll:
- Supports multiple players
- Automatic checks to prevent number skipping

### Tournament (1v1 DeathRoll):
- Automatic bracket generation with byes to fill uneven
- Forfeit functionality if a player needs to leave

### Blackjack:
- Automatic reward calculation based on common rules
- Simplistic, or visual view of cards in play
- Automatic or manual player-based draw for cards

### Extra Features:
- Block or prevent players from partaking in any game
- Accept only /random or /dice commands

## Games
### Tic-Tac-Toe
- Play against your friends, or AI
- Easy, Medium, Hard
- 3x3, 4x4, 5x5

### Minesweeper
- Easy, Medium, Hard
- 8x8, 9x9, 16x16, 18x30
- Custom Games (planned)

More features are planned, following user feedback.
punchline: Plugin to help with a number of dice games. Also offers games like Tic-Tac-Toe, Minesweeper and Bahamood.

Deep Dungeon Tracker.name: Deep Dungeon Tracker
Deep Dungeon Tracker.description:
-Keep track of the number of kills, coffers opened, regeneration potions consumed, potsherds obtained, total time and more.
-Examine the collected data.
-Scoring.
punchline: Track things inside Deep Dungeons (Solo only).

DeepDungeonDex.name: DeepDungeonDex
DeepDungeonDex.description:
A live bestiary for Deep Dungeon. Shows target mob aggro type, a subjective threat level, vulnerability to stun, and a general overview of notable mechanics. Threat level is meant to be taken with a grain of salt, is aimed towards solo players, and assumes a general familiarity with
deep dungeon mechanics and the class being played. Information is accurate to the best of my knowledge based on crowdsourced information, but please open an issue on the GitHub or ping me in either the Deep Dungeons or QuickLauncher Discord servers if anything is found to be inaccurate or if you'd like to make a report on untested data.

Deliveroo.name: Deliveroo
punchline: Better Grand Company Deliveries

DelvCD.name: DelvCD
DelvCD.description: DelvCD provides highly customizable UI elements that can be used to track cooldows, status and more with configurable conditions.
punchline: Customizable UI elements to track cooldowns, status and more.

DelvUI.name: DelvUI
DelvUI.description: DelvUI provides a highly configurable HUD replacement and is highly inspired by ElvUI from WoW
punchline: A modern HUD replacement built for customization.

DeviceChangeFix.name: DeviceChangeFix
DeviceChangeFix.description:
Stops controller input from freezing randomly by ensuring FFXIV only polls for controllers when one is actually connected or disconnected. Doesn't require any configuration.

Original plugin by PGGB, icon from Mutant Standard.
punchline: Stops controller input from freezing randomly.

Diadem Calculator.name: Diadem Calculator
Diadem Calculator.description: Calculates your current sessions points and scrip reward
punchline: Yet another useful calculator~

Dialog Copy.name: Dialog Copy
Dialog Copy.description:
Automatically copy ANY text on your screen.

There are two modes:
        -Normal Mode: Automatically copies a select number of text elements to your clipboard.
        -Text Copy Mode: This mode allows you to copy the text of ANY text element on the screen.

Default keybinds to toggle between the two modes are:
      [Left Control] [Left Shift] [Spacebar]
punchline: Automatically copy ANY text on your screen by choice.

Directional.name: Directional
Directional.description: Draw the compass directionals around the target (boss relative or true north)
punchline: Draw the compass directionals around the target for easier callouts

Discard Helper.name: Discard Helper
Discard Helper.description: Small plugin to help keep your inventory organized (especially when automating retainers or submersibles) by discarding items you don't want (e.g. Stuffed Alphas)
punchline: Discard items automatically via a command or as a post-venture task for AutoRetainer

Discord Chat Bridge.name: Discord Chat Bridge
Discord Chat Bridge.description: This plugin allows you to receive your chat messages inside of discord.

Discord Rich Presence.name: Discord Rich Presence
Discord Rich Presence.description: This plugin allows you display your character and current zone in your Discord profile.

Distance.name: Distance
Distance.description:
Displays the distance in yalms (or meters, depending on client language) to your target and/or other enemies, players, NPCs, etc.  It can also display the aggro range for supported bosses.
Please note that this plugin automatically downloads updates for aggro data by default.  This can be disabled in the plugin settings if you wish.
punchline: Target distance widgets.

Distant Seas.name: Distant Seas
Distant Seas.description:
The ultimate Ocean Fishing plugin. Automatically suggests baits, logs each boat you're on, tracks progress to achievements, adds a global point leaderboard, and more!

Icon from the Mutant Standard project.
punchline: The ultimate Ocean Fishing plugin.

Divination.AetheryteLinkInChat.name: Divination.AetheryteLinkInChat
Divination.AetheryteLinkInChat.description: 从游戏聊天信息的地图链接，中显示一个传送链接到最近的以太之光的链接。输入 /alic 来配置插件。
punchline: 快速传送以进行怪物狩猎和寻宝！

Divination.Calculator.name: Divination.Calculator
Divination.Calculator.description: Simple plugin to just add /calc command.
punchline: /calc 33 - 4

Divination.Debugger.name: Divination.Debugger
punchline: You don't need this unless you are developer.

Divination.DiscordIntegration.name: Divination.DiscordIntegration
Divination.DiscordIntegration.description: Dalamud Plugin to support Rich Presence for FFXIV.
punchline: Fully-customizable Discord Rich Presence

Divination.FaloopIntegration.name: Divination.FaloopIntegration
Divination.FaloopIntegration.description: Show Faloop mob spawn notifications in in-game chat. Type /faloop to configure the plugin.
punchline: Faloop Notification in Chat

Divination.InstanceIDViewer.name: Divination.InstanceIDViewer
Divination.InstanceIDViewer.description: show instance id in chat when instance changed

Divination.PowerUtils.name: Divination.PowerUtils
Divination.PowerUtils.description: Add /power save, /power balance, /power perf, /monitoroff commands for power management
punchline: Save Energy!

Divination.TwitterIntegration.name: Divination.TwitterIntegration
Divination.TwitterIntegration.description: Dalamud Plugin to add tweet function and Twitter timeline in FFXIV chat
punchline: Tweet in FFXIV chat.

Divination.Voiceroid2Talker.name: Divination.Voiceroid2Talker
Divination.Voiceroid2Talker.description: Add /voiceroid2 command into FFXIV. Require SimpleVoiceroid2Proxy (https://github.com/SlashNephy/SimpleVoiceroid2Proxy).
punchline: Text-to-Speech for Voiceroid2

Doorbell.name: Doorbell
Doorbell.description:
Play a chime when someone comes into a house, when they leave or when entering a house people are already inside.

Icon by Flaticon
punchline: Play a chime when someone comes into a house.

Dot Calculator.name: Dot Calculator
Dot Calculator.description: Show as FlyText or chat prints how much damage the current DoT you have put on the target has dealt
punchline: Show how much damage your DoTs have dealt so far

Double Weaver.name: Double Weaver
Double Weaver.description: Double weaving in high latency network.
punchline: Double weaving with high ping

DragoonMayCry.name: DragoonMayCry
DragoonMayCry.description: A plugin that tries to add flavour to combat. You score by dealing damage, and lose points if you are not greeding correctly. Now with dynamic BGM.
punchline: A plugin that ranks your performance based on your fundamentals in combat

Dresser Anywhere.name: Dresser Anywhere
Dresser Anywhere.description: Use dresser outside of inns. Search items in other inventories or cheap at vendors. Try on your own character. Browse modded items.
punchline: Improve glamour dresser

Duty Announcer.name: Duty Announcer
Duty Announcer.description: Announces the name of the loading duty roulette
punchline: A Duty roulette announcer

Duty Tracker.name: Duty Tracker
Duty Tracker.description: Track some duty info. /dt open the menu
punchline: Track some duty info.

DutyLanguage.name: DutyLanguage
DutyLanguage.description: Lets you configure voice acting language on a per-duty basis.
punchline: Diversify your ingame voice acting experience

DutyPusher.name: DutyPusher
DutyPusher.description: You can use this plugin to push notify to your device when your duty is ready
punchline: Push notify to your device when your duty is ready

Dynamic UI Scaling.name: Dynamic UI Scaling
Dynamic UI Scaling.description: Automatically finely scales the game UI by resolution.
punchline: Automatically finely scales the game UI by resolution.

DynamicBridge.name: DynamicBridge
DynamicBridge.description: Automates character appearance changes through rule-based presets, utilizing integration with other popular customization plugins. This enables seamless and context-sensitive transformations, enriching gameplay and increasing immersion.
punchline: Allows you to automatically change your appearance based on various conditions.

Easier Faux Hollows.name: Easier Faux Hollows
Easier Faux Hollows.description: Based on ezFauxHollows, but uses known patterns instead of general-purpose solver.
punchline: Faux Hollows solver based on known patterns

Easy Inventory Sort.name: Easy Inventory Sort
punchline: sort your inventory a little faster

Easy MBHistory.name: Easy MBHistory
Easy MBHistory.description: Copies the marketboard transaction history into your clipboard with configurable options.
punchline: Useful for when you want to quickly export marketboard transaction history.

Easy Translate.name: Easy Translate
Easy Translate.description:
Search anything and get the translations in other languages.
Use /et to open the ui or /et <search term> to search directly!
punchline: Translate anything!

EasyEyes.name: EasyEyes
EasyEyes.description: Hides VFXs which are too bright or distracting

EasyZoom.name: EasyZoom
EasyZoom.description: 轻松的变焦距离解锁和焦点控制。 /ezoom to open config panel
punchline: 轻松的变焦距离解锁和焦点控制。 /ezoom to open config panel

EasyZoom Reborn.name: EasyZoom Reborn
EasyZoom Reborn.description: Easy zoom distance unlock and fov control. /ez opens the EasyZoomReborn configuration window.
punchline: Easy zoom distance unlock and fov control. /ez opens the EasyZoomReborn configuration window.

Echoglossian.name: Echoglossian
versions: Dante Souza e Souza - aka lokinmodar

Elden Ring April Fools.name: Elden Ring April Fools
Elden Ring April Fools.description: Currently under development with extra features, should currently function as the April Fools joke did.
versions: Fools by Goat, taken over by Roselyn, on life support by Franz
punchline: Recreation of the Elden Ring April Fools joke.

Emote Command Complex.name: Emote Command Complex
Emote Command Complex.description:
This plugin adds a command so that you can have more complex custom emotes.
Such as if you want to have one macro do an emote on a targeting and non-targeting basis.
punchline: Complex custom emotes now with targets!

Emote log.name: Emote log
Emote log.description: Adds a window logging all emotes used on you, so you never miss a sneaky dote again.
punchline: Track who used what emotes on you.

EnemyListDebuffs.name: EnemyListDebuffs
EnemyListDebuffs.description: Displays your debuffs on the enemy list.

EnemyListHP (former EnmityHp).name: EnemyListHP (former EnmityHp)
EnemyListHP (former EnmityHp).description: Displays enemies hp in enemy list. Just does that, nothing else.
punchline: Displays enemies hp in enemy list.

EngageTimer.name: EngageTimer
EngageTimer.description:
Combat Timer for OBS and ingame overlay with some benefits like a big nice countdown in the middle of the screen in the style of the original one.
Please consult the repository link for OBS setup instructions.

Eorzea Votes.name: Eorzea Votes
Eorzea Votes.description: Cast your vote in daily lighthearted opinion polls!
punchline: Cast your vote in daily lighthearted opinion polls! Is a hot dog a sandwich?

Etheirys Synchronos.name: Etheirys Synchronos
Etheirys Synchronos.description: This plugin will synchronize your Penumbra mods and current Glamourer state with other paired clients automatically. Built upon Mare Synchronos before Discord Auth
punchline: Let others see you as you see yourself.

Eureka Helper.name: Eureka Helper
Eureka Helper.description:
A tool to assist you on your Eureka adventures, now updated for Dawntrail! Type /eurekahelper to get started.

Features include:
- In-Game Tracker GUI
- Instance Tracker
- Elementals Tracker
- Relic Helper
- Alarms
- Money NM weather timings
- More to come
punchline: Eureka Tracker in a plugin with many other features.

Eureka Linker.name: Eureka Linker
Eureka Linker.description:
Automatically notifies you about NMs in Eureka, with the ability to pop them on a tracker.
Other Features:
- Fairy Finder
- Bunny Timer Window
- Bunny Coffer Helper
- Stats
- Quest Guide (clickable coords)
- Localized (DE, FR, JA)
punchline: Help, Link and Pop

Eventy.name: Eventy
Eventy.description:
Simple but useful calender
- Current events displayed within a server bar entry for quick viewing
- Browse through current, upcoming and previously held events
- Special dates for Liveletters and other important occasions are highlighted
punchline: Never forget a seasonal event ever again

Expanded Search Info.name: Expanded Search Info
Expanded Search Info.description:
Displays extra information pulled from search info when examining.

Support for:
- Any plain text URL
- Pastebin.com
- carrd.co/crd.co
- F-List
- Refsheet

Simply examine someone with a search info containing pointers to one of
these locations and the plugin will display information automatically.

ExtraChat.name: ExtraChat
ExtraChat.description:
ExtraChat adds end-to-end encrypted, cross-data-centre, unlimited linkshells
to the game.
punchline: Cross-data-centre linkshells with unlimited members.

FAKE NEWS.name: FAKE NEWS
FAKE NEWS.description: 调用ChatGui在本地发送假消息，和sonar发的原理应该差不多
punchline: 发送假消息

FATE Auto Sync.name: FATE Auto Sync
FATE Auto Sync.description: Automatically level syncs your character and activates your tank stance whenever you join a FATE.
punchline: Just waiting till I get banned so square can implement this ingame.

FATE/Map Gil Tracker.name: FATE/Map Gil Tracker
FATE/Map Gil Tracker.description:
This plugin aims to simplify gil tracking for FCs who use FATEs/Maps as fundraising events!
Simply install it, enable it, and it'll automatically track every chest or sack opened and calculate how much gil each person owes.
punchline: A Plugin to track gil earned from FATEs or Treasure Maps!

FC Name Color.name: FC Name Color
FC Name Color.description: Color your FC's tag or the entire nameplate if they are in your FC. Use /fcnc to open up the config.

FF Logs Viewer.name: FF Logs Viewer
FF Logs Viewer.description: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game. Add a context menu to open someone's logs. Layout, style, stats, default metric, and more are all customizable in the settings.
punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.

FF Logs Viewer (CN).name: FF Logs Viewer (CN)
FF Logs Viewer (CN).description: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game. Add a context menu to open someone's logs. Layout, style, stats, default metric, and more are all customizable in the settings.
punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.

FFXIV2MQTT.name: FFXIV2MQTT
FFXIV2MQTT.description: Send data to an MQTT broker to do all sorts of things. Change your lights with a macro, turn on the heater when you use Overheat, or start playing Rules of Nature when you switch to Gunbreaker. Requires an MQTTv5 compatible broker.
punchline: Send game info over MQTT

FFXIV RP Event Calendar.name: FFXIV RP Event Calendar
FFXIV RP Event Calendar.description: An in game portal to the FFXIV RP Event Calendar (https://ffxiv-rp.org).  Use /events to bring up the list of roleplay events happening this week.
punchline: Want to know what's going on in roleplay today?

FFXIV Vibe Plugin.name: FFXIV Vibe Plugin
FFXIV Vibe Plugin.description: Plugin that let you vibe your controller or toys

Fader Plugin.name: Fader Plugin
Fader Plugin.description: Lets you automatically hide certain game UI elements based on number of conditions.
punchline: Automatically hides UI elements.

Fake Name.name: Fake Name
Fake Name.description:
Fake name is a Dalamud plugin that visually changes the player's name to whatever someone wants in order to provide anonymity while streaming, recording videos or taking pictures.
It's really easy to use and set up, /fakename opens up the settings window

If it messed up your chat box, please use chat2!
punchline: Show a fake name on your game ui.

FakeName.name: FakeName
FakeName.description:
支持多角色：名牌，宠物名牌，选角界面，小队列表，目标信息，焦点，倒计时通知。
支持当前角色：角色信息，好友，部队，通讯贝
不支持：聊天面板
punchline: 修改游戏界面中出现的角色名。(还没测，好多报错乱修一通，可能会崩!!!)

Fancy Loading Screens.name: Fancy Loading Screens
Fancy Loading Screens.description: This plugin shows the destination zone's concept art while loading.

Fantasia+.name: Fantasia+
Fantasia+.description: A plugin that allows you to customize your character beyond FFXIV limitations by directly editing bone parameters.
punchline: Customize your character beyond FFXIV's limitations.

Fantasy Player.name: Fantasy Player
Fantasy Player.description:
Control Spotify playback from within FFX|V
Use the button below to open settings or use the '/pfp settings' command.

Fast Job Switcher.name: Fast Job Switcher
Fast Job Switcher.description: Enables the player to switch jobs using their three letter acronyms as commands. (*: five or more)
punchline: Always five* keystrokes away from any job

Fish Notify.name: Fish Notify
Fish Notify.description: Plays a sound when a fish is caught, depending on tug-strength
punchline: Plays a sound when a fish is caught

FishersIntuition.name: FishersIntuition
punchline: 渔人的直感

FlashOnTell.name: FlashOnTell
FlashOnTell.description: Flash FFXIV's program on the taskbar when you receive a /tell. This plugin has no configurable settings at this time.

Food Check.name: Food Check
Food Check.description: See who is missing food buff at countdown start and optionally post to party/echo chat with a customizable message.
punchline: Someone in our group wouldn't eat their food. I got tired of telling them to. Now the plugin does.

Fractionality.name: Fractionality
Fractionality.description: This plugin is available as an option in ReAction now.
punchline: DEPRECATED

FuckAnimationLock.name: FuckAnimationLock

Globetrotter.description: Automatically shows where treasure maps are located.

Good Memory.name: Good Memory
Good Memory.description:
Adds an indicator in item tooltips to show whether you have acquired that item.

This indicator is in the item's description near the bottom and only appears for
items that are unlockable, such as orchestrion rolls, minions, etc.

GoodFriend.name: GoodFriend
GoodFriend.description:
A plugin that improves to the in-game friend system.

Key Features:
- Send and receive notifications when your friends login and logout*.
- Get notified when your friends use the world visit system*.
- Chat messages showing how many of your friends are online when you log in.
- Private in design, all identifying information is hashed before being sent to the server.

 * Other friends must also have GoodFriend installed.

- needs MIDI files to work
- adapts MIDI tracks to fit in game limitations for you
- you will be scored :O
punchline: Bard performance assistant

Heliosphere.name: Heliosphere
Heliosphere.description:
Heliosphere is a mod manager and platform designed to work directly with
Penumbra. It enables efficient downloads and fast installs to let you get back
to the fun part of mods: using them.

Heliosphere supports:
- Direct install to Penumbra
- Compressed and deduplicated (read: small) downloads
- Automatic updates (optional)
- Version history
- Mod changelogs
- Pictures in Penumbra
- And more

Give Heliosphere a try, and see if you can't say goodbye to any old mod
platform you were using before.
punchline: An efficient mod manager and platform that integrates directly with Penumbra.

Toggle with '/physics t', or use on/off instead of t. 
May cause excessive jiggling at lower FPS values. 
Disabling the entire plugin after turning on/off with /physics requires reboot to reenable.
punchline: Reduces the refresh rate of movement physics, "fixing" it at high fps.

Macro Chain Redux.name: Macro Chain Redux
Macro Chain Redux.description:

Adding '/nextmacro' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #02
Adding '/nextmacro down' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #11
Also allows executing any macro from chat using '/runmacro'
You can repeat a macro by using /runmacro inside the macro followed by the number of the macro you're editing
Using '/macrocancel' will stop the currently running macro
punchline: A modified fork of the old Macro Chain that allows you to run multiple macros one after the other (or repeat them).
