Material UI.name: Material UI
Material UI.description: Auto updating Material UI with customizable accent color and more. Icon by Mek

Meddle.name: Meddle
Meddle.description: Did I mention I'm a model? Export models to glTF format.

Memory Marker.name: Memory Marker
Memory Marker.description:
Ever forget which waymark slot holds your pre-fight positions? Which waymarks are for pugs and not your static?
Worry not! MemoryMarker has your back!

Loads and Saves waymarks when changing zones. Allows you to rename presets in the waymark window.
punchline: Simple Waymark Management with Renaming Features

Mendingway.name: Mendingway
Mendingway.description: A plugin to give 2 Bnuuys their correct names.
punchline: Give Mendingway and Vendingway the respect they deserve!

MidiBard 2.name: MidiBard 2
MidiBard 2.description:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
- Solo and ensemble mode support
- Text commands for instrument equip and switch
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
punchline:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard

Mimicry Helper.name: Mimicry Helper
Mimicry Helper.description: Use /mimic to open up the menu and click on the appropriate button to automatically mimic the role you're looking for.
punchline: Automatically mimic the role you're looking for.

Minesweeper.name: Minesweeper
Minesweeper.description:
Logic puzzle in which you find and flag hidden mines.

Left click to uncover a square, right click to place a flag.
The game ends when all safe squares have been uncovered.
Click the smiley face to start a new game.
punchline: Classic puzzle game.

Mini.name: Mini
Mini.description: Additionally can minimize game to tray or create game's tray icon
punchline: Adds a button and a command to minimize your game into taskbar

Mini-Mappingway.name: Mini-Mappingway
Mini-Mappingway.description: A plugin to show your friends and FC members on the minimap. Customise the markers and toggle whether you want to see friends, FC members, or both, in the settings! Icon by @Miendoodle on twitter. Thanks nya for the idea!
punchline: A plugin to show your friends and FC members on the minimap

Minimap Marker Magnitude.name: Minimap Marker Magnitude
Minimap Marker Magnitude.description: Changes the size of your minimap's icons.
punchline: Modify the magitude of your minimap's markers!

Minion Roulette.name: Minion Roulette
Minion Roulette.description: Make sure to enable the checkbox in the Minion Guide if you want only your favorite minions to be swapped
punchline: Swap between your minions every time you change zones

MiscPlugin.name: MiscPlugin
MiscPlugin.description: Just some stuff I wanted in plugin-form really.
punchline: Anti afk & doze and sit emote replacer (Runtime hooking)

MogMogCheck.name: MogMogCheck
MogMogCheck.description: MogMogCheck is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Moogle Treasure Trove event (called Mog Mog Kollektion in German, hence the name).
punchline: Tracking assistant for Moogle Treasure Trove rewards

Monster Loot Hunter.name: Monster Loot Hunter
Monster Loot Hunter.description: Check where you can obtain a material from monsters, duties, crafting, gathering or where they can be bought from NPCs.
punchline: Check where you can obtain materials.

MonsterDex.name: MonsterDex
MonsterDex.description:
A live bestiary.
Shows target mob aggro type, a subjective threat level, status vulnerabilities, and a general overview of notable mechanics.
Threat level is meant to be taken with a grain of salt, is aimed towards solo players, and assumes a general familiarity with deep dungeon mechanics and the class being played.
Information is accurate to the best of my knowledge based on crowdsourced information, but I could use your help! Please open an issue on the GitHub if you'd like to correct inaccurate or untested data.
Originally DeepDungeonDex
punchline: Live monster data.

Moodles.name: Moodles
Moodles.description: Design and apply your own status effects with custom formatting, durations, and other accoutrements.
punchline: Crippling depression now in the form of a debuff, kupo!

Mount Collectioner.name: Mount Collectioner
Mount Collectioner.description: A plugin allows you to track received mounts by character.
punchline: Plugin for track collected mounts

Mount Radio/Mount Music Player.name: Mount Radio/Mount Music Player
punchline: URL music player for your mounts! Stream internet radio when on a mount or on foot.

Mouse Target Tooltip.name: Mouse Target Tooltip
Mouse Target Tooltip.description: A plugin that shows a tooltip for mouseover targets.
punchline: Shows a tooltip with a little information for characters that the mouse is over.

Mouseover Action.name: Mouseover Action
Mouseover Action.description: This plugin allows for macro-like use of actions without any macro delay. /pmoaction to open UI

MultiHit.name: MultiHit
MultiHit.description: Papa asked me for this so here it is.
punchline: Split flytext into multiple hits.

N'esswen's Chat Tools.name: N'esswen's Chat Tools
N'esswen's Chat Tools.description: N'esswen's chat tools for additional message filtering. Use /nct to set up.
punchline: N'esswen's chat tools for additional message filtering.

N'esswen's Macro Repeater.name: N'esswen's Macro Repeater
N'esswen's Macro Repeater.description: Adds a /nmr command that will repeat current macro from the beginning.
punchline: N'esswen's macro repeater.

N'esswen's Retainer Notes.name: N'esswen's Retainer Notes
N'esswen's Retainer Notes.description: Adds a new column for retainers for a note. Use /nrn to set up the notes.
punchline: N'esswen's Retainer Notes.

NICE Damage Flyouts.name: NICE Damage Flyouts
NICE Damage Flyouts.description: Adds the message NICE to your damage flyout when you get a hit ending in 69. No that's it for real.
punchline: Adds the message NICE to your damage flyout when you get a hit ending in 69.

NOTED.name: NOTED
NOTED.description:
Lets you create notes that are linked to specific duties (they will only show during those duties).
You can also tie notes to certain jobs so they only appear when on the right job.
punchline: Duty-specific notes!

Nael'd it for UCOB.name: Nael'd it for UCOB
punchline: because reading chat is not a mechanic

NamePlateDebuffs.name: NamePlateDebuffs
NamePlateDebuffs.description: Displays your debuffs on enemy nameplates.

Nameplate Debuffs.name: Nameplate Debuffs
punchline: Displays debuffs on enemy and player nameplates

NameplateColor.name: NameplateColor
NameplateColor.description: Change Nameplate's color to favorite color per role, and hide FreeCompanyName.
punchline: Nameplate Color Change.

Namingway.name: Namingway
punchline: Rename abilities and status effects.

NecroLens.name: NecroLens
NecroLens.description: DeepDungeon Helper. Radar for Mobs, Aggro, Sight and everything else.
punchline: A true Necromancer always know the DeepDungeon ... everyone else just uses a high tech!

Neevie Auto-Mammet Emote Generator.name: Neevie Auto-Mammet Emote Generator
Neevie Auto-Mammet Emote Generator.description:
Neevie Auto-Mammet Emote Generator accepts a series of quotes provided by you, the user.
A random quote is selected and inserted into the emote, and the emote is split into chunks if the string is too long to fit in a single emote.

Special thanks to Infi's BetterPlaytime and Lady Defile's Wordsmith, from whose code I took a lot of ... inspiration ...
punchline: Now you too can be annoyed to death by a mammet that spews quotes at you.

Neko Fans.name: Neko Fans
Neko Fans.description:
Shows you an image of a random neko character. Click on the image to view the next one.
You can choose different image sources, allowing you to look at Catboys, Waifus, Cats, Dogs and more.

Supported APIs:
nekos.best, Nekos.life, Dog CEO, The Cat API, Pic.re, Waifu.im, Waifu.pics and shibe.online

Warning: You might see naughty images
punchline: Frustrated in a dungeon? Look at a cute cat girl!

Neko Fans NSFW 18+ Patch.name: Neko Fans NSFW 18+ Patch
Neko Fans NSFW 18+ Patch.description:
This Plugin does nothing on its own. Neko Fans needs to be installed.
You now have access to NSFW images in Neko Fans.
punchline: Frustrated in a dungeon? Look at a cute cat girl! Or look at sexy anime tiddies!

Neon Castbars.name: Neon Castbars
Neon Castbars.description: Colors your target and/or focus target castbars based on their progress.
punchline: Colors enemy castbars based on progress

NextUIOverlay.name: NextUIOverlay
NextUIOverlay.description: OverlayPlugin replacement for Dalamud, works similarly to BrowserHost with addition to having more options and built in websocket server.
punchline: OverlayPlugin for Dalamud with built in HUD replacement

NextUIPlugin.name: NextUIPlugin
NextUIPlugin.description: OverlayPlugin replacement for Dalamud, works similarly to BrowserHost with addition to having more options and built in websocket server.
punchline: OverlayPlugin for Dalamud with built in HUD replacement

No Kill Plugin.name: No Kill Plugin
No Kill Plugin.description: A simple plugin that prevent the game from killing itself with lobby error.

NoBongos Plugin.name: NoBongos Plugin
NoBongos Plugin.description: Small plugin to toggle sound effects/noises.

NoClippy.name: NoClippy
NoClippy.description: Reduces the effects of lag on certain aspects of the game, such as weaving and statuses. Usable as an alternative, or in addition, to XivAlexander.
punchline: Reduces the effects of lag on certain aspects of the game, and can show GCD clips

NoSoliciting.name: NoSoliciting
NoSoliciting.description:
Customisable chat and Party Finder filtering. In addition to letting
you filter anything from chat and PF, it comes with built-in filters
for the following:

- RMT (both gil and content)
- FC ads
- RP ads
- Phishing messages
- Static recruitment
- Trade ads
- Community ads
- Any PF with an item level over the max

NoTankYou.name: NoTankYou
NoTankYou.description: Displays warnings when you or any party members are missing role specific actions such as partner buffs, pets, and tank stances.
punchline: Warns you when yourself or others are missing role-specific actions

NoTypeSay.name: NoTypeSay
NoTypeSay.description:
Adds a button on the duty list for /say quests like quest items and emotes have!
 Compatible with all languages and controllers.
punchline: Tired of typing snae ling? Click instead!

NotificationMaster.name: NotificationMaster
NotificationMaster.description: Notifies you about various events while your game is minimized.
punchline: Currently supports notifications: chat messages, approaching map flag, duty found, ending of cutscenes, gp restoration, error during logging in, mob has been pulled.

NowPlaying.name: NowPlaying
NowPlaying.description: Display what is playing in your server bar, and play/pause/skip. Great with macros! (--> Windows only <--)
punchline: Display what is playing in your server bar, and play/pause/skip. (Windows only)

Ntfynder.name: Ntfynder
Ntfynder.description: A plugin that uses Ntfy (https://ntfy.sh/) to send mobile push notifications when party members join or leave, or when a duty finder queue is initiated. Forked from PushyFinder.
punchline: Mobile push notifications for the Party Finder. Alternative to PushyFinder without need for paid app or any hastle

Nya Damage Prediction.name: Nya Damage Prediction
punchline: A plugin add flytext now Percent Damage

NyaDraw.name: NyaDraw
punchline: 下一代小画家

OBSPlugin.name: OBSPlugin
OBSPlugin.description: A plugin to control OBS by WebSocket, streaming with any UI modification is not recommended.
punchline: Control OBS by websocket

OOBlugin.name: OOBlugin
punchline: oob oob

OOF!.name: OOF!
OOF!.description:
i love roblox!!! 
           
whimsical and magical features...
  - when other ppl die
  - custom mp3
  - instant access to the hour long documentary on oof by hbomberguy
punchline: Play OOF! on fall and/or death. The Only Plugin You Need!

OOFingway.name: OOFingway
OOFingway.description:
Fork of the OOF! Plugin made by Frogworks-Interactive
           
features
  - oof on party & alliance deaths!
  - use custom mp3 sounds! 
  - DBO (Distance Based Oof)!
  - instant access to the hour long documentary on oof by hbomberguy!
  - fully featured settings window!
punchline: Play the OOF! sound on fall and/or death.

ObjectExplorer.name: ObjectExplorer
punchline: A convenient way to explore current objects around you. Currently supports players only.

OfDungeonsDeep.name: OfDungeonsDeep
OfDungeonsDeep.description:
Based loosely on DeepDungeonDex (by Strati), OfDungeonsDeep is an all-in-one tool for Deep Dungeon floor and mob information.
Data sourced with permission from https://www.ddcompendium.com/.
punchline: Comprehensive monster dex for DeepDungeons

Oh gee, CD.name: Oh gee, CD
Oh gee, CD.description:
OGCD assistant providing Text To Speech, (Custom) Sound Effects and unlimited extra bars to visualize and alert you for your OGCDs.

This is an early version and things might still break.
punchline: oGCD helper

OldMacroRecursion.name: OldMacroRecursion
OldMacroRecursion.description:
Execute macros from macros. /runmacro ## [shared] [line]
Check out Macro Chain Redux by Aida Enna (from: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Aida-Enna/XIVPlugins/main/repo.json)
punchline: the old version of what is now Macro Chain

Oops All Race.name: Oops All Race
Oops All Race.description: 本插件没有任何歧视性行为
punchline: 转变所有人的种族

Oops, All Lalafells!.name: Oops, All Lalafells!
Oops, All Lalafells!.description:
Turn everyone around you into Lalafells (or other races)!

Use /poal to open settings.

OopsAllLalafellsSRE.name: OopsAllLalafellsSRE
OopsAllLalafellsSRE.description: Turn everyone around you into Lalafells (or other races!)
punchline: Turn everyone around you into Lalafells (or other races!)

OpenerCreator.name: OpenerCreator
OpenerCreator.description: Create your opener and practice with a striking dummy. Provides basic analysis.
punchline: Create, save, and practice your openers.

Orange Guidance Tomestone.name: Orange Guidance Tomestone
punchline: Leave messages like in Souls games. Great chest ahead.

Orbwalker.name: Orbwalker
Orbwalker.description: Locks player movement while casting and allows for maximum caster uptime during the course of a fight.
punchline: S P A C E G L I D I N G

Orchestrion Plugin.name: Orchestrion Plugin
Orchestrion Plugin.description: Adds a simple front-end for browsing and changing the in-game BGM.  /porch to open

Outfit Manager.name: Outfit Manager
Outfit Manager.description: Easy outfit changing if you know the name with penumbra/glamourer and gearset support.
punchline: Allows penumbra/glamourer/gearset assignment via chat command.

OwO.name: OwO
punchline: owo for your chat

PF Symbol Converter.name: PF Symbol Converter
PF Symbol Converter.description:
Converts text to symbols mostly for use in making party finders.

Use [] around characters you want to be converted.
You can also do {} inside the brackets to make numbers appear circular instead of just square version.

Example: /pfc [PGP Cyberpunk Night] Drinks [11pm-3am] EST

Paggles.name: Paggles
Paggles.description: Changes the time in the Server Bar to use the system locale for AM/PM designation.
punchline: My Final Fantasy XIV says paggles right next to the time, what does this mean?

PaissaHouse.name: PaissaHouse
PaissaHouse.description:
Looking for that perfect house? PaissaHouse lets you receive notifications when a new plot of land is up for sale on your home world.

Want to contribute? Check out the repository (globe icon below) for instructions.

Palace Pal.name: Palace Pal
Palace Pal.description:
Shows possible trap & Accursed Hoard locations in Palace of The Dead, Heaven on High, and Eureka Orthos.

This plugin requires Splatoon in order to render various draws on the screen.
punchline: Shows possible trap & Accursed Hoard locations in Palace of The Dead, Heaven on High, and Eureka Orthos.

Palette+.name: Palette+
Palette+.description: Custom color palettes for FFXIV characters.
punchline: Custom color palettes for FFXIV characters.

Pandora's Box.name: Pandora's Box
Pandora's Box.description:
Pandora's Box is a collection of major QoL tweaks and adjustments.

Open the box with /pandora
punchline: Do you dare to open Pandora's Box?

Party Icons.name: Party Icons
Party Icons.description:
Adjusts player nameplates base on current content. For example you can display raid positions (that are assigned automatically by listening to the chat), job icons, or names with job icons.

Reverse-engineering effort achieved by authors of JobIcons: haplo, daemitus, Loskh, wozaiha, without them this plugin would not be possible!
punchline: Replace names with job icons, raid role positions and more!

Party List Extras.name: Party List Extras
Party List Extras.description: Adds Text and Icons next to the party list describing active buffs. Still missing some jobs - See github for progress. Please note the overlay goes to the left of your party list.
punchline: Parses Buffs to help understand what your party is doing.

Party List Layout.name: Party List Layout
Party List Layout.description: Customize the layout of the party list.

PartyPlanner.name: PartyPlanner
PartyPlanner.description: A plugin to see partyverse.app events.
punchline: See partyverse.app events ingame

Pat Me.name: Pat Me
Pat Me.description: Did you ever wonder how many times your Lala gets a pat? Well, now you can count it!
punchline: Pat counter

Pathfinder.name: Pathfinder
Pathfinder.description: A tool for visually locating any model path in the game world.
punchline: Visualizer for nearby model paths. Adds +5 to perception.

Peeping Tom.name: Peeping Tom
Peeping Tom.description: Shows who is currently or was previously targeting you.

Peepingtom改.name: Peepingtom改
Peepingtom改.description: 显示谁正在或者曾经以你为目标 战场可用(嘘)
punchline: 显示谁正在或者曾经以你为目标 战场可用(嘘)

PenSynth.name: PenSynth
PenSynth.description: I'm lazy so i spent 20+ hours programming instead.
punchline: Pens' Synthesis

Penny Pincher.name: Penny Pincher
Penny Pincher.description: Copies 1 below the cheapest offer to your clipboard when you check marketboard prices. /penny help

Pet Nicknames.name: Pet Nicknames
Pet Nicknames.description:
Give your minions, Carbuncles and Faeries cute nicknames
and share them with your friends.
punchline:
Give your minions, Carbuncles and Faeries cute nicknames
and share them with your friends.

Pet Scale.name: Pet Scale
Pet Scale.description: Adjust the scale of your own pets and other player's pets, independent of each other.
punchline: Customize pet scale

PikuminMarker.name: PikuminMarker
PikuminMarker.description: Puts a marker on the specified player. If the target player travels to DC, the internal ID will change and the marker will be invalid.
punchline: Add Marker for Pikumin.

PingPlugin.name: PingPlugin
PingPlugin.description: A ping display plugin for Dalamud.

Pixel Perfect.name: Pixel Perfect
Pixel Perfect.description: Adds an indicator of your hitbox.

Player Coords.name: Player Coords
Player Coords.description: Allows you to get the coordinate information for all nearby players
punchline: Get the coordinate information for all nearby players

Player Spy.name: Player Spy
Player Spy.description: A plugin that lets you modify a penumbra mod dynamically based on if someone is nearby.
punchline: A plugin that lets you modify a penumbra mod dynamically based on if someone is nearby!

Player Tags.name: Player Tags
Player Tags.description:
Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat. Create custom tags and add them to players with the context menu.

You want to contribute and help developing new features or want to extend existing? Feel free to open Fork and open a Pull Request!

This plugin was originally developed by r00telement but forked and continued by Pilzinsel64.
punchline: Lightweight job visibility in nameplates and chat.

PlayerTrack.name: PlayerTrack
PlayerTrack.description: Keep track of players you meet.

Portrait Fixer.name: Portrait Fixer
Portrait Fixer.description:
When you click "Update Gear Set", this plugin will automatically update and save your portait to match your new glam.

This plugin is in testing and will have one or more issues, laid out below:

- Rarely, a glitched desynth window will pop up when saving the gearset instead of it saving the portait. This is being investigated, closing the window and swapping classes seems to fix it.

Please report issues/bugs and post suggestions on the Github website by clicking the globe icon.
punchline: Automatically update your portait when your gearset gets updated

Positional Assistant.name: Positional Assistant
Positional Assistant.description: If you have a hard time telling whether you're in the right spot for positional attacks, this plugin can draw guidelines on your screen to help you tell where you need to be.
punchline: Never guess whether you'll make that positional again!

PostMeteion.name: PostMeteion
PostMeteion.description: Meteion would deliver the command to process which you post to her by httpapi. And sometimes, she will sing the endsong for you. Goodluck~ Warrior of Light.
punchline: Meteion will process the command you post and report information.

Potato Famine.name: Potato Famine
punchline: No more lalas.

Potato Famine 2.name: Potato Famine 2
Potato Famine 2.description: Changes lalafells (or everyone or specific people) into another race of your choosing.
punchline: Square, please give us miqote sandboxes and au ra heating lamps. We will pay real money.

PrefPro.name: PrefPro
PrefPro.description: Changes in-game dialogue to your desired gender and name. /prefpro for the menu.

Price Insight.name: Price Insight
Price Insight.description:
Whenever you mouseover an item, it will show you the NQ/HQ marketboard prices at the bottom as well as the most recent purchase.
Prices are retrieved from Universalis.app and cached for 90 minutes.
To refresh a price you can tap Alt while hovering over an item.
punchline: See item marketboard prices on hover!

Prioritizer.name: Prioritizer
punchline: Prioritizer sets game's priority to high while crafting. No more failed crafts due to random lags while game is minimized.

Puppet Master.name: Puppet Master
punchline: Let others tell you what to do.

Puppets.name: Puppets
Puppets.description: Enables you to easily and automatically sync emotes via party chat!
punchline: Simple emote syncing!

PushyFinder.name: PushyFinder
PushyFinder.description: A plugin that uses Pushover (https://pushover.net), Discord, or Ntfy (https://ntfy.sh) to send mobile push notifications when party members join or leave, or when a duty finder queue is initiated.
punchline: Mobile push notifications for the Party Finder.

PvP Tracker.name: PvP Tracker
PvP Tracker.description: Record, browse and filter your Crystalline Conflict, Frontline and Rival Wings match history, view match scoreboards and view aggregated statistics like win rate and average damage dealt per match.
punchline: PvP match history and stats tracker.

QoL Bar.name: QoL Bar
QoL Bar.description:
A plugin designed to provide a simple, customizable and always available interface for chat commands
or other plugins to alleviate the need for using macros and hotbar space to achieve similar results.

The plugin should initially appear as a small box on the bottom center of the game window.

Quest Map.name: Quest Map
Quest Map.description:
Explore quests and their rewards.
- Search for quest names or their rewards, including instances,
  beast tribes, minions, etc.
- See an interactive map of quest requirements and unlocks.
- Open a quest info window even for quests you haven't completed.
- Open quest starting locations on the map or open quests in the journal.

Quest Solver.name: Quest Solver
Quest Solver.description:
Help you to solve the quests. It is still working in progress! I am lazy, you know!
vnavmesh required!
punchline: Help you to solve the quests!

Quest Tracker.name: Quest Tracker
punchline: For the quest completionist

QuestAWAY.name: QuestAWAY
QuestAWAY.description: Removes unwanted icons from your map.

Questionable.name: Questionable
Questionable.description:
A tiny little quest helper plugin, which does quests for you automatically where possible. Uses navmesh to automatically walk to all quest waypoints, and tries to automatically complete all steps along the way (excluding dungeons, single player duties and combat).

Not all quests are supported, check the discord or git repository for an up-to-date list.

Required Plugins: vnavmesh, TextAdvance, Lifestream
punchline: A tiny quest helper plugin.

Quiet The Den.name: Quiet The Den
Quiet The Den.description: Auto-mute BGM while in the Wolves' Den, because I've had enough and it ends here.
punchline: Stop yer ears bleedin' in the Wolves' Den

Quote of the Lobby.name: Quote of the Lobby
Quote of the Lobby.description: Displays a random dialogue, and/or the datacenter you'll be connecting to when you press GAME START.
punchline: Simmer does the light before every login.

RP Logger.name: RP Logger
RP Logger.description: An automated scribe documenting your adventures in Eorzea. /rpl for configuration.
punchline: An automated scribe documenting your adventures in Eorzea

RP Utils.name: RP Utils
RP Utils.description: A suite (eventually) of features to support roleplay. Currently only the sonar. /rputils
punchline: Supporting your RP needs.

RP-TBX.name: RP-TBX
RP-TBX.description:
RP'ers toolbox - Kitsune Release
 Just a gal tryna fix a plugin.
punchline: RP'ers toolbox - Kitsune Release

RPBlurb.name: RPBlurb
punchline: Realtime RP bios

RPP - Roleplay Profiles.name: RPP - Roleplay Profiles
RPP - Roleplay Profiles.description: A plugin for roleplayers, displaying character profiles from Central Archives (centralarchives.org) and its regional RP portals, Chaos Archives (chaosarchives.org) and Crystal Archives (crystalarchives.org), for characters with the RP flag on.
punchline: Display profiles from Chaos Archives, Crystal Archives, and Central Archives in-game

RTyping.name: RTyping
RTyping.description: Allows other people using this plugin to see your typing status when in the same party.
punchline: Let people know when you r typing.

Racingway.name: Racingway
Racingway.description: A simple plugin for timing, logging, and ranking players times for your jumping puzzles!
punchline: Time your jumping puzzles!

Radar.name: Radar
Radar.description:
在屏幕和游戏地图上显示游戏实体的位置。
Displays game objects location on screen and map.
punchline: Displays game objects location on screen and map.

Radar Plugin.name: Radar Plugin
Radar Plugin.description:
Radar to see enemies, objects, and interactables through walls.
This is an ESP, please don't use it to call aliens down.
Please report any issues to the author.
punchline: See everything through walls

RaidNotes.name: RaidNotes
RaidNotes.description: Dynamic encounter notes for that reminder you so sorely need. /notes
punchline: Dynamic encounter notes.

Random Class Selector.name: Random Class Selector
Random Class Selector.description: Allows you to select a random class to do dailies/etc on.
punchline: Can't decide what class to work on today? Let the plugin decide for you!

Razer Reader.name: Razer Reader
Razer Reader.description: Select your installed version of Razer Synapse to automatically pull device battery levels from local log files
punchline: Display the battery level of your wireless Razer devices

ReAction.name: ReAction
ReAction.description: Improves aspects of the battle system with action stacks (like MOAction) and various QoL settings.
punchline: QoL for the battle system.

ReSanctuary.name: ReSanctuary
ReSanctuary.description:
A plugin to improve Island Sanctuary. Features:

- Mark items to gather on the proper map
- Gathering & crafting todo-list, showing you what mats you require
- Widget for quick access to information

Icon from the Mutant Standard project.
punchline: Improve your Island Sanctuary experience.

Ready Check Helper.name: Ready Check Helper
Ready Check Helper.description: Displays the names of the players that were not ready in chat following the completion of a ready check, and optionally adds ready check status icons over the party and alliance lists.
punchline: Extends the game's built-in ready check.

Reborn Toolbox.name: Reborn Toolbox
Reborn Toolbox.description: Various tweaks and features provided by the Combat Reborn team that don't need their own plugin
punchline: Let that sink in!

Redirect.name: Redirect
Redirect.description: Easily change the targeting priority for spells and abilities. Queue macros, sprint, and potions! Type /redirect to configure.
punchline: Change where your actions are going, queue macros, queue sprint, and queue potions!

Remote Party Finder Uploader.name: Remote Party Finder Uploader
Remote Party Finder Uploader.description:
Uploads the PF listings you retrieve to the crowdsourced Remote
Party Finder website (https://xivpf.com/).
punchline: Crowdsourced PF website (upload PF listings to xivpf.com)

RepairMe.name: RepairMe
RepairMe.description: Helps you notice when your gear needs to be repaired or has materia to be extracted. /repairme to config

ResLogger2.Plugin.name: ResLogger2.Plugin
ResLogger2.Plugin.description:
ResLogger2 allows you to log paths that the game loads in a fast and convenient
window, with multiple options including only logging unique paths, path filters,
and uploading found paths. Information on the crowdsourced paths is available
at https://rl2.perchbird.dev.
Open the UI with /reslog.
punchline: A path logger with optional crowdsourcing functionality.

Reset Enmity Command.name: Reset Enmity Command
Reset Enmity Command.description: Add a reset striking dummy enmity command.
punchline: Add a reset striking dummy enmity command.

Reset dummy enmity command.name: Reset dummy enmity command
Reset dummy enmity command.description: A text command for reset target striking dummy enmity.

Reset enmity command.name: Reset enmity command
Reset enmity command.description: Add a reset striking dummy enmity command.
punchline: Add a reset striking dummy enmity command.

Resizable HUD.name: Resizable HUD
Resizable HUD.description: Allows you to more freely and precisely scale and position HUD elements.
punchline: Move and scale vanilla hud elements to your liking!

Resonant.name: Resonant
Resonant.description: Displays accurate player hitbox and positional outlines.

Retainer Sales.name: Retainer Sales
Retainer Sales.description: Indication that a retainer has sold something while you were logged off.
punchline: See retainer sales quicker

RetainerTrack.name: RetainerTrack
RetainerTrack.description:
Keeps track of who a retainer belongs to - if you have seen the retainer's owner locally (if you were on the same party, or if you have seen an item crafted by them).

Tracking is unavailable if the crafter isn't the retainer owner (to avoid resellers being attributed incorrectly), and if the tooltip says 'Obtaining Signature'.
punchline: Track who a retainer belongs to.

RezPls.name: RezPls
RezPls.description: Easy overview about who is currently resurrecting who, who is already resurrected, and who has removable detrimental status effects.

Rezo Scale Plugin.name: Rezo Scale Plugin
Rezo Scale Plugin.description:
Ever wanted to render at lower resolution? Now you can!
Only works with AMD FSR graphics upscaler
punchline: Lower 3D Resolution Scale

Right Back At You.name: Right Back At You
punchline: Nothing but a second-rate, trying hard, copycat!

RightClickSearchInfo.name: RightClickSearchInfo
RightClickSearchInfo.description: Allows you to search a player in-game and on the web by right-clicking them.

Rotation Solver.name: Rotation Solver
Rotation Solver.description:
Analyses combat information in every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.

Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.

It is designed for GENERAL COMBAT, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.
punchline: Analyses combat information in every frame and finds the best action.

Rotation Solver Reborn.name: Rotation Solver Reborn
Rotation Solver Reborn.description:
Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.
Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.
It is designed for `general combat`, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.
punchline: Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.

SAMMI Webhook Plugin.name: SAMMI Webhook Plugin
SAMMI Webhook Plugin.description:
Sends game data SAMMI via webhook, allowing users to automate OBS actions such as playing effects, transitions, sounds, etc. based on in-game events.
Requires SAMMI and OBS to function. See https://sammi.solutions or the plugin's readme on GitHub.
/psammi to configure.
punchline: OBS automation based on game events via SAMMI webhooks

Sample Plugin.name: Sample Plugin
Sample Plugin.description: This plugin serves as a sandbox/playground for me, it serves no purpose.
punchline: A plugin for private use. It does not provide anything usefull.

Satisfier.name: Satisfier
Satisfier.description: Make custom deliveries less annoying by automating the process.
punchline: Simplify custom deliveries.

Saucy.name: Saucy
Saucy.description: 自动执行某些金蝶小游戏,解除国服限制
punchline: 当为金蝶游戏活动太费时间的时候！启动它！

Say What?.name: Say What?
Say What?.description: Prints NPC speech bubbles to the chat log.  Please check the plugin settings and your chat log filters to make sure that they are compatible with each other.
punchline: Persistent NPC Flavor Text

Scout Helper.name: Scout Helper
Scout Helper.description: A helper for generating scout tracker links for a-rank hunt trains
punchline: A helper plugin for pre-populating hunt train scout tracker links

Seated Sidekick Spectator.name: Seated Sidekick Spectator
Seated Sidekick Spectator.description: Adds chat or toast notifications whenever someone enters or exits your mount.
punchline: Get notified when someone enters or exits your mount!

SeeBoss.name: SeeBoss
punchline: A parsing plugin.

SeeBuff.name: SeeBuff
SeeBuff.description: SeeBuff/n 能通过/SeeBuff ID buffid time 来自定义显示buff

SelectString.name: SelectString
SelectString.description: Numpad is also supported. Note: some menus, like World Visit, are not supported, and whether they will be in future or not remains a question.
punchline: Select items in menus via 0-9 keys rather than mouse.

SeletRollItem.name: SeletRollItem
SeletRollItem.description:
自定义快捷键后，鼠标移动到物品上快速roll点或放弃
使用/SeletRollItem pai能排相关副本理符/SeletRollItem pai 随机任务：练级排练级本
punchline: 自定义快捷键后，鼠标移动到物品上快速roll点或放弃

SelfCare.name: SelfCare
SelfCare.description: Configurable reminders to hydrate and maintain a healthy posture.
punchline: Remember to check your posture!

Shop Item Revealer.name: Shop Item Revealer
Shop Item Revealer.description: Opens a window when speaking with a supported vendor, showing items that are not unlocked and what their conditions are. It checks quests, achievements, and reputation requirements.
punchline: Shows you what items vendors won't sell you yet.

Show Gear.name: Show Gear
Show Gear.description:
Normally the Fitting Room defaults to showing you just the piece of gear you’re trying on. This plugin inverts that behaviour: when you launch the game, the Fitting Room (plus Item Dyeing and Glamour Plate Selection) will show all your gear by default.

NB: there are some oddities to how Item Dyeing and Glamour Plate Selection behave when this plugin is doing its thing. If you’d rather it not touch those windows at all, there’s an option for that (and more details about the problem) in the settings.

Icon adapted from OpenMoji, CC BY-SA 4.0.
punchline: Shows your gear in the Fitting Room by default.

Sightseeingway.name: Sightseeingway
Sightseeingway.description: Renames screenshots as they are created to include character name, map name, and coordinates. Monitors default, Reshade and GShade screenshots.
punchline: Automatically rename your screenshots with character and location info.

SillyChat.name: SillyChat
SillyChat.description: Make chat more fun with translations like pirate and urianger.

SimonSays.name: SimonSays
SimonSays.description: Syncs emotes by using the chat itself, read Usage tab!
punchline: Sync emotes like never before!

Simple Heels.name: Simple Heels
Simple Heels.description: 调整穿着高跟鞋以及做情感动作时的偏移量。
punchline: 调整穿着高跟鞋以及做情感动作时的偏移量。

Simple Map Tracker.name: Simple Map Tracker

Simple Tweaks.description:

All changes are toggleable, with everything disabled by default. Visit the Repo for a full list of tweaks. (Globe icon below)

Simple Tweaks Plugin.name: Simple Tweaks Plugin
Simple Tweaks Plugin.description:
A collection of Quality of Life tweaks. Aiming to improve the experience without changing anything drastically.
All changes are toggleable, with everything disabled by default. Visit the Repo for a full list of tweaks. (Globe icon below)

Highlights:
  - Compact UI and user theme
  - Customisable search options
  - Rich ways for plugin interaction

Check out the 'Introduction' on Config Window for documentation.
punchline: A simple and compact market board plugin for power users.

SkipCutscene.name: SkipCutscene

Sneak On By.name: Sneak On By
Sneak On By.description: Adds markers for the areas around a monster where it will detect you. Allows you to more easily sneak around pesky mosnters.

Snooper.name: Snooper
Snooper.description: Adds a /snooper command that shows a separate window that shows only messages from the player you're currently targeting. Useful for keeping track of different conversations during crowded RP events.

Something Need Doing.description: A hard-working peon that crafts what you tell him to. An all-in-one sythesizing solution.

机器翻译：这是发布后的补丁。它没有针对 CN 客户端进行任何其他修改（因为我不知道它是否需要修改，如果需要，请告诉我）。

Sonar.description: Automatically send and receive hunt and fate relays. /sonar to open, /sonarconfig to configure. This plugin is closed source and support is only provided in the Sonar Support discord.

SortaKinda.name: SortaKinda

punchline: Total customization of your inventory

Sound Filter.name: Sound Filter
Sound Filter.description:
Filters any sound or set of sounds from the game.

- Remove a battle sound effect you don't like
- Remove specific emote sounds
- Remove specific background music

SoundSetter.name: SoundSetter
SoundSetter.description: A Dalamud plugin that allows volume control from anywhere, including gpose and cutscenes.

Speak Beaver.name: Speak Beaver
Speak Beaver.description: /speak 打开主界面，主界面里有命令帮助和使用说明，/svoice 打开语音控制界面
punchline: 大河狸会帮助你输入信息，但是代价是什么呢

Spiritbond Watcher.name: Spiritbond Watcher
Spiritbond Watcher.description: Tells you when to extract materia when you're actually paying attention.
punchline: Extract materia when you're paying attention.

Splatoon.name: Splatoon
Splatoon.description: Splatoon is a powerful accessibility tool. It revolutionizes gameplay with its custom waymark system, offering the ability to create unlimited grouped waymarks, labels, and actor indicators with exacting pixel precision. This feature empowers players by making crucial objects and events more visually discernible, thereby facilitating quicker reactions. However, it's important to note that the plugin does not come pre-loaded with presets. Players have the freedom to craft their own or import existing ones, offering a personalized touch to their gaming experience.
punchline: Redefining FFXIV navigation with unlimited, precise waymarks.

SplatoonX.name: SplatoonX
punchline: 国服画家SPLX 6.5CN 解限特供

Spotify Cutscener.name: Spotify Cutscener
Spotify Cutscener.description:
Allows you to automatically pause BGM while listening to music on Spotify, and to pause Spotify itself when in a cutscene, and resume it once the cutscene is over.
Use /spcut for settings.
punchline: Automatically pauses in-game BGM while listening to Spotify, and Spotify when in a cutscene :)

Squadronista.name: Squadronista
punchline: Simplified Squadron Calculator, heavily inspired by https://ffxivsquadron.com/

StackSellPrice.name: StackSellPrice

Stanley Parable XIV.description: Witty commentary to the brilliant things you do.

Submarine Tracker.name: Submarine Tracker
Submarine Tracker.description:
+ Tracker for current builds, routes and times 
+ Builder to improve, solve builds and optimize EXP
+ Configurable notification for return and repairs 
+ Helpy filled useful information
+ Custom loot overview with history and export
+ Multiple overlays to help with daily tasks 
+ Supports multiple FCs
punchline: You do not talk about Fight Club, same for Submarines

S怪触发小助手-Extra.name: S怪触发小助手-Extra

TPie.name: TPie
TPie.description: Highly configurable hotbars that can be toggled with a keybind. They can be filled with Actions, Items, Gear Sets, Macros and more...
punchline: Customizable ring-shaped hotbars

TabTab.name: TabTab
TabTab.description: Customise the behaviour of tab targeting. Use /ptab to open configuration.

Tallafell.name: Tallafell
punchline: They hide inside bosses' legs! Clothing! Other players! No longer, I say -- it's time to put an end to the Lalafell menace.

Target Furniture.name: Target Furniture
Target Furniture.description:
Currently, the only possible way to select a housing item is to click the furniture itself, and this can be a problem if you have multiple items close to each other.

This plugin adds a new option in the Housing Menu that targets the furniture for you
punchline: You can now select furnitures from the Housing Menu

Target Lines.name: Target Lines
punchline: Customizable target lines

Team Fortress Fantasy.name: Team Fortress Fantasy
Team Fortress Fantasy.description:
* Show a Win Panel (with sounds!) when you clear or get wiped in a duty.
* Show a TF2-style timer while in a duty.
* Enable the "Voice Lines" module (via /tfconfig) to have voice lines play when certain conditions are met. What conditions, you ask? It's a surprise! (Unless you uncheck the "Surprise me!" box.)
* More features maybe soon?

Note: This plugin uses files from a local Team Fortress 2 installation.
It'll search for the game's installation folder in all configured Steam Library Folders automatically.

Without a TF2 install, the Timer and Win Panel will work with FF XIV fonts, and no voice line will work.
punchline:
[REQUIRES TF2 INSTALLED FOR MOST FEATURES] The Mann Brothers just found a deposit of gravel in Eorzea
and hired YOU, Mercenary of Light, to help them FIGHT for it.

Teamcraft List Maker.name: Teamcraft List Maker
Teamcraft List Maker.description:
No more alt tabbing, no more writing down names of items, just add and export!

This plugin is not created by Teamcraft staff and they are not responsible for it. To report issues or request new features, please click the globe icon and submit them using the issues tab.

(Logo used with permission from Teamcraft owner)
punchline: Adds a new menu when right clicking items that lets you easily add/remove items to a list and then export it to Teamcraft

Teleport to Aethernet.name: Teleport to Aethernet
Teleport to Aethernet.description: Teleports to the town's Aetheryte, then automatically opens the Aethernet menu on the Aetheryte and selects the correct Aethernet destination.
punchline: Chat commands for teleporting to Aethernet Shards in towns.

Teleporter.name: Teleporter
Teleporter.description: Chat Commands for teleporting to Aetherytes. /tp for help

Telesto.description: This plugin allows Triggernometry (and other programs, why not) some means to interact with the game directly.

Temp_Telesto.description: This plugin allows Triggernometry (and other programs, why not) some means to interact with the game directly.

Text Box Styler.name: Text Box Styler
Text Box Styler.description: Allows replacing every text box with the background of your choice.

TextAdvance.name: TextAdvance
punchline: Automatically skips subtitle boxes and confirms cutscene skipping. Useful mostly for alt levelling. Requires /at command to be typed on each log in to be enabled.

TextToTalk.name: TextToTalk
TextToTalk.description: Chat TTS. Use /tttconfig to configure the enabled channels and triggers/exceptions.

The Great Controller HUD Switcher.name: The Great Controller HUD Switcher
The Great Controller HUD Switcher.description: A simple tool to automatically switch between keyboard and controller hud's when pressing WASD or moving the left joystick. You can setup a macro to add the actions to your hotbar.
versions: Callum Carmicheal (with help from Aida Enna)
punchline: Toggle controller / mouse mode automatically or with commands.

The Great Separator.name: The Great Separator
The Great Separator.description:
Add separators to various numbers.

- Damage/healing numbers (not DoTs or other players' numbers)
- Party list HP
- Ability costs on hotbars
- Ability costs in tooltips

The Heart of the Party.name: The Heart of the Party
The Heart of the Party.description:
The Heart of the Party is a remake of the in-game title picker, but it
supports searching. Note that it doesn't add a command to set your title; use
the built-in /title command instead.
punchline: Set your character's title - now with Searchalin!

TheDot.name: TheDot
TheDot.description: A dot to mark players hitbox
punchline: A dot to mark players hitbox.

Tick Tracker.name: Tick Tracker
Tick Tracker.description: Customizable bars that indicate the tick progress of HP/MP/GP regen
punchline: Tracks the current tick for HP/MP/GP regen

Tidy Chat.name: Tidy Chat
Tidy Chat.description:
It is highly recommended to edit the default settings as you may disagree on which messages should be considered "spam"!

Provides granular filter options to filter nearly all game-related spam, leaving only important game messages in your chat.

  - Filters most spammy game messages
  - Blocks emote spam from other players
  - Condenses earned commendations into a single line
  - Shortens lengthy messages such as joining Novice Network or entering an instanced zone
  - Blocks repeated messages from appearing for a period of time
  - Automatically copies most 'with your chat mode in /say' quest dialogue to your clipboard
  - Write custom filters to Allow/Block messages!
  - And more!
punchline: Better game messages and in-depth chat filters to keep a tidy chat.

Tilted.name: Tilted
Tilted.description: Automatically adjusts the Third Person Camera Angle/Distance given certain conditions.
punchline: Tilt the camera, not yourself.

TinyCommands.name: TinyCommands
TinyCommands.description: Adds tiny and simple but useful chat commands, and nothing more. It doesn't even have a UI.

Tippy.name: Tippy
Tippy.description:
Developed by goat for April Fools 2021 and unnecessarily resurrected by kal.

Handcrafted by our finest code artisans with special AI, 
he will analyze your playstyle to give you useful tips to get your GAMING to the next level.

Some things he can do:
* He can give general tips about the game
* He can give tips about the job you're playing
* He can report on your battle performance
* He will respect your feelings
punchline: Tippy, your new FFXIV virtual assistant.

Title Edit.name: Title Edit
Title Edit.description:
Create your own custom title or character select screen of your favorite location in-game, and open the game right up to that spot every time.
Includes a number of preinstalled title and character select screen presets for you to use or get inspiration from, and an easy to use importer to use presets that others have shared!
Character select presets support recording your last visited location, per character display setting and even displaying yourself on a mount.
punchline: Create, share, and shuffle custom title and character select screens for FFXIV.

Title Renamed.name: Title Renamed
Title Renamed.description:
Rename a title displayed on the nameplate to something else.
Optionally, hide a specific title.
punchline: Check out my new title! ... Uhmm, renamed, I mean.

Title Renamed [TEST].name: Title Renamed [TEST]
Title Renamed [TEST].description:
Rename a title displayed on the nameplate to something else.
Optionally, hide a specific title.

Title Roulette.name: Title Roulette
Title Roulette.description: Allows you to pick any number of titles, setting a random one each time you use "/ptitle" or "/ptitle groupName".

TitleEdit.name: TitleEdit
TitleEdit.description: Create, share, and shuffle custom title screens for FFXIV.

Toastingway.name: Toastingway
Toastingway.description: Displays new items, crystals, and gil as toasts.
punchline: Keep on top of new items.

TooltipNotes.name: TooltipNotes
TooltipNotes.description: Right-click any item in your inventory to start adding a note,or make a label in the config window to start adding your own labels

- Show when sightseeing log vistas are available
- Add markers for ARR vistas
- Open vista locations on your map
- Hide already completed or unavailable vistas
- Show the command needed for each vista

Tracky.description:
### Normal Functions 
+ Track currency increase
+ Track teleport and npc repair costs
+ Track desynthesis results
+ Track retainer ventures

### Advanced  Functions
+ Track different coffer rewards
  - Venture Coffer
  - Materiel Container 3.0
  - Materiel Container 4.0
  - Sanctuary Materiel Container
+ Track Eureka bunny rewards
+ Track Eureka/Bozja lockboxes
punchline: Tracking data is fun

Travelcase.name: Travelcase

Twitch XIV.name: Twitch XIV

Thanks to aers for finding this.
punchline: Remove letterboxing from cutscenes on ultrawide monitors.

Umbra XIV.name: Umbra XIV
Umbra XIV.description: Adds quality of life improvements to the game and consolidates common UI elements and actions into a single uniform interface in the form of a toolbar.

UnloadErrorFuckOff.name: UnloadErrorFuckOff

VFXEditor.description: VFX editor and browser, open with /vfxedit

VFXEditorCN.name: VFXEditorCN
VFXEditorCN.description: 游戏内视觉效果、动画与音频编辑插件 | 图标来源: PAPACHIN | 本地化维护: AtmoOmen
punchline: VFX 编辑器、查看器 (中文汉化版)

Vanilla Hotbar Extender.name: Vanilla Hotbar Extender
Vanilla Hotbar Extender.description: Allows you to use commands to save the actions in a hotbar and then load them into any other hotbar. Like the vanilla "/hotbar copy" command, but unlimited, without taking up other hotbars to save the actions.
punchline: Save and load actions into hotbars without taking up extra job hotbars.

Venue Manager.name: Venue Manager
Venue Manager.description: Save and share venues you visit or own. Get updates and logs for visitors coming and going. Guest list management tools for venue owners to view and easily export it for use with other applications. Icon by Silv :)
punchline: Bookmark the venues you visit. View and manage guests for venues.

Visibility.name: Visibility
Visibility.description:
Allows you to hide players, pets chocobos and minions.
Includes VoidList, which is a better blacklist.
Accessible via /pvis
More information available via /xlhelp

Voice Director.name: Voice Director
Voice Director.description: Changes your VO language by specifying a language and an instance, your language will revert to the default when you exit. Icon designed by Leremy from Flaticon
punchline: Changes your VO language on a per-duty basis

VoidList.name: VoidList
VoidList.description: Completely removes chosen players from your game.

WOLdo.name: WOLdo
WOLdo.description: Movable text overlay of the current location name. Please consider migrationg to WhereAmIAgain, which is actively maintained and has more features.
punchline: Making it easier to know where you are.

WTSync.name: WTSync
WTSync.description: WTSync keeps uses an external server to keep track of the duties in your Wondrous Tails book. When you're in a party, and other players in the party are also using WTSync, you can open a UI to see which duties everyone needs at once in one convenient list.
punchline: View a list of all the Wondrous Tails duties shared by your party.

Waitingway.name: Waitingway
Waitingway.description:
Contributes and utilizes crowdsourced login queue information for the benefit of everyone.

Current features include queue time estimates and notifications via Discord, so you can know when you make it
into the game, as well as anonymously collecting and reporting statistics about your login queue times to crowdsource
information about FFXIV server load. Join our Discord for more information!

Discord URL: https://waiting.camora.dev/discord
punchline: Set out for Dawntrail and make your queues a breeze. Waitingway provides crowdsourced FFXIV login queue times, now with Discord queue notification features.

Waitingway (Unofficial).name: Waitingway (Unofficial)
Waitingway (Unofficial).description:
Contributes and utilizes crowdsourced login queue information for the benefit of everyone.

Current features include queue time estimates and notifications via Discord, so you can know when you make it
into the game, as well as anonymously collecting and reporting statistics about your login queue times to crowdsource
information about FFXIV server load. Join our Discord for more information!

Discord URL: https://waiting.camora.dev/discord
punchline: Unofficial/uncertified build of Waitingway. Set out for Dawntrail and make your queues a breeze. Waitingway provides crowdsourced FFXIV login queue times, now with Discord queue notification features.

Waymark Preset Plugin.name: Waymark Preset Plugin
Waymark Preset Plugin.description: Manage waymark presets.  Use "/pwaymark help" for more information.

Weatherman.name: Weatherman
punchline: Allows precise control over time and weather per zone or globally.

WeathermanExtras.name: WeathermanExtras
punchline: Experimental Weatherman functions. Use at your own risk.

WhatchaSay.name: WhatchaSay
WhatchaSay.description: The all-in-one translator for your social needs.

Where am I again?.name: Where am I again?
Where am I again?.description: Shows what zone/region/territory you are in up in the corner next to the server and time info. Open config with /waia.
punchline: Shows what zone/region/territory you are in next to the server info.

Where's Mouse?.name: Where's Mouse?
Where's Mouse?.description: An accessibility plugin to help you locate your mouse cursor when you need it the most.

Where's WOLdo.name: Where's WOLdo
Where's WOLdo.description: Text overlay of current location name.

Where's my mouse.name: Where's my mouse
Where's my mouse.description:
Add UI element on top of the mouse like circle to keep track of your mouse location during gameplay.
Open settings with /wmm
punchline: Allows you to not lose track of your mouse on the screen

Which Mount.name: Which Mount
Which Mount.description: Plugin adds a 'Mount Search' button to the target's context menu, showing information in chat about the mount and how to obtain it. Settings allow you to include the current availability of the mount in the game and other details.
punchline: Show mount information of other players

Which Patch Was That?.name: Which Patch Was That?
Which Patch Was That?.description:
Whenever you mouseover an item, the tooltip will show you the patch the item was released in.
Never carry around old useless crafting materials again!
punchline: Quickly check the patch an item was released in!

Who Did That?.name: Who Did That?
Who Did That?.description:
This plugin can track the following actions:
- Rescues
- Healing actions
- Status/Buff Application
- Cleanses 
- Heals
- Mitigation
- Provoke
- Shirk

These will be logged in your chat when they are used on your character.
punchline: Actively logs healing, cleanses, buffs, and more. Finally figure out who rescued you.

Who am I again?.name: Who am I again?
Who am I again?.description: Shows who you are in the server info bar.
punchline: Ever forget who you are? We can fix that!

Who emoted at me.name: Who emoted at me
Who emoted at me.description: Ever been afk and people try to socialize, but you're unsure if they tried to interact? Now! You'll always know if emoted at you! You afking fucking sack of shit.
punchline: Never lose who has emoted at you when afk.

Who's Talking.name: Who's Talking
Who's Talking.description:
Once installed, join a Discord voice channel and an XIV party, and have people put their character names in their Discord nicknames (or configure things manually in the plugin settings). You should get colourful outlines around the job icons on the party list: green for talking, blue for muted, red for deafened, and yellow for unknown name.

Note that you'll get a permission prompt mentioning "StreamKit Overlay" – this is expected.

Some icons by Google, Apache 2.0.
punchline: See Discord voice activity indicators directly on your party list.

Wholist.name: Wholist
Wholist.description:
Show nearby players in a stylish way, inspired by the "/who" command from World of Warcraft

Features:
- Minimalistic interface that can be scaled down to become part of your HUD.
- Player context menu items for examining, searching on the Lodestone and more.
- Customizable colours & behaviour.
- Random adventure plate command
- Display nearby player count in the server info bar

Please note this plugin will automatically disable functionality in PvP.
punchline: Show nearby players in a stylish way, inspired by the "/who" command from World of Warcraft.

Window Locker.name: Window Locker
Window Locker.description: A simple plugin that lock the positions of specified windows. /windowlocker to open.

Window Title Changer.name: Window Title Changer
Window Title Changer.description: Allows you to change your game window title

WoLua.name: WoLua
WoLua.description: Write custom chat commands by creating lua scripts

Wordsmith.name: Wordsmith
Wordsmith.description: Wordsmith is a text editor with roleplayers in mind. It automatically breaks your text up for easy copy/paste, has advanced features, spellcheck, and even a thesaurus.
punchline: A roleplay thesaurus and scratch pad.

Workshop Optimizer Plugin.name: Workshop Optimizer Plugin
Workshop Optimizer Plugin.description: Use /wso after you visited your island.
punchline: Optimize Island Sanctuary Workshop orders.

Workshoppa.name: Workshoppa
punchline: Better Company Workshop Turn-In

Wotsit.name: Wotsit
Wotsit.description:
Adds a convenient quick search akin to Spotlight that lets you open game windows, teleport, find wiki articles, and more.
Press Control + T to open the search window. This can be changed by searching for "Wotsit Settings".
punchline: Find anything, go anywhere, in style.

Wotsit: Definitive Edition.name: Wotsit: Definitive Edition
Wotsit: Definitive Edition.description: Experience new heights of Wotsit in this reimagining of the most useful and critically acclaimed Dalamud plugin.
punchline: Now we're talking

Wrath Combo.name: Wrath Combo
Wrath Combo.description: Turns one action into many! Similar to how PvP actions work, we take an action and build a whole combo out of it. Sometimes it's as simple as a 1-2-3 combo, other times it's a full job rotation. Either way, you'll find something suited for your rotation needs.
punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.

XAT.name: XAT
XAT.description: Create and edit animations and cutscenes

XAT [Migrate to Brio].name: XAT [Migrate to Brio]
XAT [Migrate to Brio].description: Create and edit animations and cutscenes

XCount.name: XCount
punchline: 计算你周围物体的数量

XIV Combo.name: XIV Combo
XIV Combo.description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. /pcombo to open menu

XIV Combo Expanded.name: XIV Combo Expanded
XIV Combo Expanded.description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. For example, a 1-2-3 combo would become 1-1-1.
punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button.

XIV Combo Expanded Customized.name: XIV Combo Expanded Customized
XIV Combo Expanded Customized.description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. For example, a 1-2-3 combo would become 1-1-1. Please keep an eye on the GitHub page for changes without a version bump!
punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button.

XIV Combo Expandedest.name: XIV Combo Expandedest
XIV Combo Expandedest.description:
This is an enhanced version of XIVCombo with a variety of new added features.
This is mutually exclusive with other XIVCombo versions, so make sure they do not conflict!
punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. Plus extras.

XIV Combo Kamified.name: XIV Combo Kamified
XIV Combo Kamified.description:
This is an enhanced version of XIVCombo with a variety of new added features.
This is mutually exclusive with other XIVCombo versions, so make sure they do not conflict!
Updated for API5
punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. Plus extras.

XIV Combo Very Expanded.name: XIV Combo Very Expanded
XIV Combo Very Expanded.description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. To a degree that some would call absurd, but that's why it's all configurable. Let the players decide.

XIV Combo Very Expanded Ank Edition.name: XIV Combo Very Expanded Ank Edition
XIV Combo Very Expanded Ank Edition.description: My custom edit fo original plugin.

XIV Instant Messenger.name: XIV Instant Messenger
XIV Instant Messenger.description:
Features:
- Opes a direct message window when you message someone or they message you
- Each window contains your DM chat with certain person
- Open and cycle through recent chats with a hotkey
- Execute emote commands on a player from their DM window without needing to manually target them
- Automatically record your chat log in an easy to read text file
- Fully customizable styles
punchline: A direct message manager made in fashion of WoW Instant Messenger.

XIV Uncombo.name: XIV Uncombo
XIV Uncombo.description: This plugin splits combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto several buttons. For example, a 1-1-1 combo would become 1-2-3.
punchline: Splits combos into more button for more button bloating. Requires BLU spells.

XIVChat Server.name: XIVChat Server
XIVChat Server.description:
XIVChat is a suite of software allowing you to use FFXIV's chat from
different devices. This is the server component required to do so.

For information about clients to use with this server, see the website.

XIVChatTypeTool.name: XIVChatTypeTool
punchline: Internal dev tools for fun and profit

XIVDeck.name: XIVDeck
XIVDeck.description:
This plugin allows players to use an Elgato Stream Deck as a virtual utility hot bar. Actions are called directly, meaning there is no need to set up awkward keybinds, custom macros, or any other settings.

Note that the XIVDeck Stream Deck plugin must also be installed for this plugin to be useful. You can download the Stream Deck plugin from the linked GitHub repository, under the "Releases" section.

Please report all problems to KazWolfe#2896 in the Dalamud Support server or by opening an Issue on GitHub.
punchline: Turn your Elgato Stream Deck into a hotbar!

XIVDupeFinder.name: XIVDupeFinder
XIVDupeFinder.description: Highlight stackable items in the inventory that are not stacked.
punchline: Highlight duplicated items in inventories /xivdupes.

XIVHardWareMonitor.name: XIVHardWareMonitor
XIVHardWareMonitor.description: 硬件监控，输入/hardware打开主窗口
punchline: 硬件监控，信息来自开源项目Libre HardWare Monitor

XIVITA Guide.name: XIVITA Guide
XIVITA Guide.description: Plugin che permette ai giocatori di accedere facilmente a delle guide scritte per i vari content come Dungeon, Trials and Alliance Raids. Punti Chiave: 1) Apre la guida (se presente) in maniera automatica quando si entra in duty 2) Interfaccia scalabile e adattabile a tutti gli schermi 3) una modalità di guida testuale breve per chi è di fretta 4) Protezione Anti-Spoiler 5) Editor guide integrato 6) Integrazioni coi vostri plugin preferiti e molto altro!
punchline: XIVITA Guide è un plugin che permette ai giocatori di accedere facilmente a delle guide scritte per i vari content

XIVITA Startup Commands.name: XIVITA Startup Commands
XIVITA Startup Commands.description: Esegue comandi testuali come emote e macro al login.
punchline: Avete mai pensato di automatizzare il vostro post-login?

XIVITASanctuary.name: XIVITASanctuary
XIVITASanctuary.description: Un plugin che migliora la vostra esperienza in  Island Sanctuary. Cosa Fa: 1) Vi segnala gli item da raccogliere nella mappa 2) todo-list per Gathering & crafting, mostrando quali di materiali avrete bisogno 3) (pianificato) Miglior vista dell'inventario. 4) Widget per accedere velocemente alle informazioni.
punchline: Il migliore strumento per la vostra isola!

XIVJitterFix.name: XIVJitterFix
XIVJitterFix.description:
随着7.0版本更新，SE 虽然为 FF14 引入了多种时间性抗锯齿方案，但均存在严重影响画质的重大缺陷。
本插件将修复NPC对话、过场动画及 GPose 模式下的画面抖动功能。作为时间性抗锯齿技术（DLSS/DLAA/TSCMAA+抖动）的核心机制，相机抖动（即难以察觉的细微位移）是确保抗锯齿效果正常运作的必要条件。
令人费解的是，SE官方竟在恰恰最需要抖动提升画质的场景中禁用了该功能。
punchline: 修复 SE 给 FF14 弄的糟糕抗锯齿效果~

XIVLogger.name: XIVLogger
XIVLogger.description: Save chat logs as text files from when this is loaded. /xivlogger for settings, /savelog to save logs, /copylogs to copy logs.

XIVR - VR Mod.name: XIVR - VR Mod
XIVR - VR Mod.description:
Mod to allow vr. Requires SteamVR Not the steam version of the game
** Requires SteamVR **
Please click the globe icon for detailed instructions.
Chat/FAQ: flat2vr.com
punchline: Mod to allow VR

XIVSlothCombo.description: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.
versions: Aki, k-kz, ele-starshade, damolitionn, Taurenkey, Augporto, grimgal
punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.

XIVSlothComboX.name: XIVSlothComboX
XIVSlothComboX.description: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.

XIVSplits.description: Split your FFXIV runs with ease!

XIVWindowResizer.name: XIVWindowResizer
XIVWindowResizer.description:
Set your game window to arbitrary size not limited by your display resolution. Mostly useful for taking high-resolution screenshots without going fullscreen and using DSR/FSR.
Requires borderless or windowed mode.
punchline: Game window resizing plugin. Ever wanted to take 8K screenshots on 144p screen? Now you can.

punchline: 传送

XivEsp.name: XivEsp
XivEsp.description: If you've ever spent ten minutes looking for your hunt target, this is the plugin for you. Set a case-insensitive substring, glob, or regular expression, and all nearby game objects with matching names will be tagged on your screen!

YEAAAAAAHT.name: YEAAAAAAHT
punchline: YEAAAAAAAAHT

Yes Already.name: Yes Already
Yes Already.description: Tired of clicking yes in Praetorium? Can't stand using keys in dungeons? Well do I have the plugin for you! Yes Already is specifically designed to click all the annoying dialogs you've grown accustomed facerolling. Just enter the dialog text, and you'll never see it again! Also works with /regex/ and has several built-in modules for dialogs that aren't quite yes/no prompts but act like it (like desynth).
punchline: Clicks Yes in various dialogs you've specified.

Yo-kai Check.name: Yo-kai Check
Yo-kai Check.description: Yo-kai Check is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Yo-kai Watch event.
punchline: Tracking assistant for Yo-kai Watch rewards

ZDs.name: ZDs
ZDs.description: Show when cooldowns come off cooldown in an intuitive way!
punchline: ZeeDees, bring the Zs to your Ds!
